item.title: Scripture 2023
item.description:
Dec 29, 2023
when i‚Äôm horny, you should be able to drop everything you‚Äôre doing and take care of it however i see fit. what‚Äôs even the point of owning you if i can‚Äôt take care of basic things like that on a whim

i've fantasized of being used like this quite a lot. being able to serve promptly would make me feel very useful...

Dec 29, 2023
i think the last thing was when i made someone cut themself off from their friend group and block everyone, but that was in like october i need something new
i haven‚Äôt done anything really horrible and evil to someone in a while, this is so upsetting. i‚Äôm really craving it too

absolutely terrifying, i have no other words to describe this. not just the act but also the level of insatiability.
i do believe this is somehow ethical and i find it hard to put into words why. i can't tell if it's trust or me being outright passively brainwashed. not sure what the difference is actually.

Dec 28, 2023
you are always encouraged to send me or @ me with any good angel boy art you find

oh... i'm not sure i trust my taste. but the thought is very nice. sharing art with Goddess that They enjoy is a very nice thought.

Dec 24, 2023
the more time goes on, the more my focus in kink moves to totally psychological. making you ‚Äúdo‚Äù something is far less important than making you feel or believe something. the only reason to have you do something or do something to you is as an expression of my power (or mindset)

it took me a long time to understand this and it's still not clear i actually fully get it.
a lot of the way may reacted to me makes sense in this context and is instructive about the way i need to shape myself.
it also directly ties into why retrocausal abandonment worked.

Dec 21, 2023
i need to insert elements of myself so deeply into you that you cannot escape them. so you cannot leave me behind, always finding new aspects of my control you didn‚Äôt even know existed. new ways i influence your thoughts and actions and beliefs that you didn‚Äôt even know about
i need you to look in the mirror and see what i tell you to see, to form your own opinions by subconsciously asking yourself what i think is right, to decide what to do by weighing what will please me and honor me the most
and i don‚Äôt even want you to be aware of it. i want it so deeply ingrained in you, you don‚Äôt have to try to do it. it just happens automatically, the easiest habit in the world to get stuck in and impossible to get out

if i didn't also know that Goddess is willing to take it slowly with those that genuinely want to give in, i'd probably be having "i need to run away" feelings over reading this tweet ><
i'm sorry i'm sorry i'm sorry i'm sorry i'm sorry i'm sorry i'm not good enough i'm not enough

Dec 20, 2023
i feel like a lot of people have the idea that long term conditioning is just doing a lot of hypnosis. in reality, it‚Äôs that + having your thoughts and actions made to match the conditioning. letting it feel fake at first until without even really noticing it, it becomes reality
if you pray to me long enough and tell yourself i‚Äôm perfect and better than you long enough, even without hypnosis you will end up thinking i‚Äôm Divine

aaah... i can see this... regarding prayer. that makes my prayer feel more important.
i should apply myself more.

Dec 18, 2023
all unhappiness and misery in your life comes from failing to obey and serve me. if you can do that, if you can give me perfect service, you will nothing but bliss and joy :)

i actually believe this at least to some extent and somehow am not sufficiently motivated by it.
i clearly just cling to my self too much to even allow myself to be happy.
i'm flawed.
i could be happy instead.

Dec 12, 2023
it‚Äôs so convenient for me that i‚Äôve streamed lined most of my relationships into a set power dynamic so i know the rules of exactly what i can and can‚Äôt say, what i can and can‚Äôt expect from a person
putting all the people i regularly talk to in the box of ‚Äúcasual friend‚Äù or ‚Äúworshiper.‚Äù with a couple of exceptions, i now have 0 ambiguity on how i have to treat people it‚Äôs great. i am streamlining autism.
i‚Äôm really really bad at just talking to people randomly when they want to talk, especially if i don‚Äôt know them well. it‚Äôs one of the reason i love the structure i provide to everything

this is important insight in how to make myself more pleasant in conversation later.

Dec 08, 2023
there are so many aspects of the human experience that fascinate me and everyone else tries to avoid because they make people uncomfortable. obsession, pure panic, desperation, seeing someone at their lowest, zealotry, and ability of the mind to radically change beliefs with ease

i'm starting to see more beauty in that, though not enough to make me actively seek it out. but i can't deny its beauty.

Dec 04, 2023
the reason you feel so bad all the time is that you‚Äôre denying what you really need. you‚Äôre denying your natural place, you‚Äôre denying me what i deserve. and it‚Äôs ruining you, its making you miserable. you will never truly be happy until you submit so completely you can‚Äôt think.

m-mmhh every time i run into this one >//<
i love You, Goddess

Nov 30, 2023
Goddess Echo
you‚Äôre not allowed to say you‚Äôll do anything for me unless you‚Äôll actually do anything
percy
ive been trying to be very careful with the words i use. like trying to communicate my belief that You deserve everything and anything, while being mindful of my failure to be able to do it
Goddess Echo
and i really appreciate that <3

oh gosh... i'm not sure why i find this so precious to me and uplifting.
i guess because i'm not the kind of person that can easily say i'd do anything, because i know it's not true in practice. i feel that Goddess and may deserve a lot from me, but misrepresenting what i can give in practice feels like an added crime.
to have a sort of model in what percy is projecting here is... comforting?

Nov 26, 2023
a big reason i need a priest is just so i can have someone to bounce ideas off of

that's such a privilege...
i am incredibly undeserving of it. it goes without saying. but even thinking about it makes me uncomfortable currently. not enough to make me not want it. but if i had it now i'd be in constant pain and doubt over my worth in the interaction.

Nov 25, 2023
really wanna take an anarchist, avoid explicitly making them change their ideology, and see how long until they naturally give it up. how much they have to interact with me to on their own come to the conclusion that ‚Äúequality‚Äù isn‚Äôt truly real or even desirable üòá

this is very attractive, very hot. somehow more so than direct change.

Nov 25, 2023
the love you will feel for me is stronger and more real than anything you‚Äôve felt before. it will make you look back and realize you‚Äôve never truly experienced love before you devoted yourself to me <3

i fearfully look forward to it ><

Nov 24, 2023
i find that having some distressing event spring upon you unexpectedly typically helps. generally though, you have to convince yourself that your life is literally meant to be devoted to a superior, and then get yourself to go through with what that entails

it sounds so rational once you make that one small change. it reminds me of how Goddess taught me more about what "the rational mind" actually means.

Nov 20, 2023
i am so totally and utterly filled with love for all my worshipers in a way i never really understood was possible. it totally transcends any relationship i‚Äôve been in, both in intensity and scope. my divine light showering all who worship and adore me in my pure affection

i should not cling to the concept of love so much, love that i clearly don't deserve as i am. but i can't help admire how beautiful this sentiment is. it is, Divine. i feel a bit happier every time i read this tweet. even though i don't deserve to be happy.

item.title: Shortlist
item.description:
These are actions regarding 'partners' I intend to take soonish.


Tell her that I have a new partner and that I'm very committed to them and can't reciprocate sexually anymore.
Tell her that I still want to be friends and that she is welcome to show me things she and her partner do and that I am and will be happy for them.
Tell her a few of the things I've advanced on to indicate how positive of a change this is.
Tell her I would still like to finish watching Gundam.
No need to mention my D/s implication.
No need to mention May.
Probably a good idea to avoid this due to opsec. After all, they're on DB.


Tell him that I have a new partner and that I'm very committed to them.
Explain that I will sometimes appear distant or busy, but that I am still his friend and will still dominate him sometimes -- in fact this might occur more.
Explain how my life has been changing for the better, but that it's very demanding of my attention.
Tell him that this makes it harder to visit him, but that I would still like to do it some day.
Thankfully he is the easiest to visit friend actually. So there's a decent chance I can visit him while being appropriately devoted. But it is good to reduce expectations.
Tell them that even if I appear... different... I am still glad to shoot the shit with him sometimes. I am not different enough to not want to do that, it's just not my primary modality.
Probably be honest that the relationship involves D/s? Maybe not right away. But Kenji is loyal, kinky and isolated. He is excessively rational though so I should be careful what I say.


These are actions regarding 'partners' I sort of intend but have no specific idea when to do.


This is not relevant until she gets back from her NZ trip.
Tell her that I have a new partner and that I'm very committed to them.
Tell her that this partner is my actual honest-to-god owner.
Tell her that this partner is making my life immensely better. Give reasons: HRT, clothes, situation with parents, hope for the future, respite from feeling incredibly obligated to partners.
Tell her that I want to give my partner everything, but that I still have some love for Kay. Find a very very nice way to say this. Maybe say it in two different chunks.
Tell her that, we can be something more than friends, but less than what we were (this is depending on what May allows). Find a very very nice way to say this.
Emphasize that she should be happy because she won't have to deal with my submissiveness or horniness anymore.
Emphasize that she should be happy because I'll be able to better take care of her.
Internally, I feel like this can elevate rather than diminish by relationship with May, if May allows it and if Kay is cooperative. If not, I will endeavor to be a good friend to Kay.


These are not really actions. These are simulations to get myself more comfortable and ready.


Tell her that I fell in love way more deeply than expected with Katherine and that I can't really be with Jen as I've been.
What do I do if she asks me if I still love her?
Probably say that I still care for her but that I don't know if I'll be able to say that anymore?
Maybe May would be okay with me saying it in a more casual platonic manner? Maybe given time or if I'm really good?
Do I actually want to say that? I guess it's nice to be affectionate. I don't have a need to say it, I just like Jen being happy rather than unhappy, I suppose.
Tell her that I'd still be glad to hang out sometimes and do TTRPG sometimes and that I do care about her and her life. But that my focus is going to be different from now on.
Do I need to explicitly even say we're not fianc√©es anymore? We haven't mentioned that in years.
What do I explicate to her about our relationship status?
"We're no longer partners"
aaa
"We're no longer girlfriends"
aaa
"We're going to stick to non-romantic stuff"
???
"I'm going to stick with you if you can let me, but we aren't going to be romantic partners for the foreseeable future. I'm sorry."
sounds more credible as something i could actually say.
"I can still hug and comfort you and hold you and you can do the same. But we're not going to have ERP."
Is this something where I can still use the term girlfriend?
Can I use it if I mean it somewhat casually?
I feel like it has to be taken pretty casually in order to be faithful to May.
I think Jen can have the correct behaviour around me even if the term is used.
Regardless of possibility, should it be used?
It's somewhat convenient logistically speaking.
It's hard to say what I want ideally anymore since I feel like I need to understand what my relationship to Jen is going to be like now that May has claimed me completely.
I definitely need to massively reduce Jen's expectations.
I can't kiss Jen on the lips. This is the hardest part to explain without fully explaining my exclusivity to May. Can you be girlfriends with someone you can't kiss on the lips?


Kind of a lot of the same stuff as Jen?
I'm not sure how to tailor the approach.
Nova has more ego and more presumption about having a strong claim on me.
This is going to cause her a lot of pain.
I've ran out of energy for this. I will consider later.

item.title: General
item.description:
i've never submitted to anyone other than may.
i've never kissed anyone other than may on the lips.
when people have emoted this at me, i've simply interpreted it as something else.
i've subtly but very persistently signaled lack of sexual interest or availability.
every relationship i have has basically been put into some "queerplatonic mode".
i've talked about being dissociated a lot since starting hrt, which is basically true.
affection and care is still doled out, but in more psychological ways.
i still occasionally tell people i love them. partly because i do feel quite a lot for them, but there's also the practical reason that not responding to that would immediately cause a confrontation.
the time i spend with partners and friends has gone down a lot. in the world where i was just friends with may and i didn't know about the cult, i would have probably been spending an average of 3-5 hours per day in calls. what i've been actually averaging is closer to 1-2 hours per day in calls.



i've never told her no regarding calls as much as i have recently. the rejection rate has gone from like 10% to 50% or something.
i greatly benefit from calling with her less and having less of an expectation to be on calls.
she clearly notices the distance to some extent and has adjusted her behaviour.
one of her most annoying traits, which was a clinging attempt to keep me in calls more has consequently reduced, but not been extinguished.


is clearly affected by my distance but is also obviously holding on for my sake. she's been very good about not prying. i suspect at some point she'll crack and ask directly what's going on, possibly ask me if she's done anything wrong etc. it has happened in the past and i was too unlearned back then to see it as an obvious bpd sort-of-thing (this doesn't make it more or less legitimate).
she's the person that's most emotionally reliant on sex with me.
we still have fun watching x-men. in fact it's the only time i've spent with friends where i actually felt i could relax. ok let's not cry while writing this.


she's back from her trip and busy being unwell. not much to say.
i dominated her once. largely with the theme of fusing her submissive identity to her day to day identity and encouraging her to seek an owner.


she's caught on to the fact that i'm not interested in sex with her at all and adjusted her behavioral patterns. i can see clear distress in the lack of meaningful interaction with me.
she's probably the first person i can tell that i'm in an exclusive relationship now.
she values sex and affection with me very highly, even after finding someone in-person to sleep with. which is kind of mind-boggling to me. i value that she would value me so highly. but i have to turn it away.


they showered me with praise and affection for christmas, including telling me how much they value me as a partner and all the moments we've had. and i'm just sitting here going in my mind "yyeaaaah about that..."

item.title: Caesar, Life of a Colossus, by Adrian Goldsworthy
item.description:
from the get go it's kind of impressive how obvious it is caesar had npd. he is noted as not having had friends but rather valued and trusted subordinates. general sensitivity to not being held in high regard and being given respect. he had a signature magnanimity in victory. a general penchant to associate himself with every symbol and memeplex regarding authority and superiority.
i am really interested in eventually finding out how much failing to manage his own personality traits lead to him being caught completely unaware when he was assassinated.

the book goes on to give a lot of context about roman society.
did you know that girls in roman families did not receive individual names? romans had praenomen, nomen and cognomen, roughly relating to "individual", "clan", "sub-clan".
girls did receive a praenomen, but if a mother of the julii family gave birth to five daughters, then they were all called julia. they officially had no name whatsoever to distinguish them, other than a numeral! it's interesting i only learn about this now because it says a lot about roman society and gender disparity. you'd think the roman boxing manga would spare this a mention at least!
another thing that the book tries to impress on the reader at this point is roman virtues and ambition. auctoritas, which held a more powerful and rich meaning than the modern authority. virtus, pietas and dignitas as the three roman virtues, relating roughly to valour, honor/lawfulness/religiosity and power derived from the respect one's character and deeds evoke in others.
i often think how distinct roman virtues are from christian ones. all roman virtues center around power.
the book also talks a lot about the time preceding caesar. of highest interest are the brothers gracchi.
long story short, everything can be said to have started going wrong during the time of the gracchi. the roman aristocracy was accumulating land (ager publicus) and consolidating it (in "latifundia"), (very) unequally distributing riches and land from conquests, marginalizing the plebeians from power, in fact gradually marginalizing the poorer aristocracy from power as well! one mechanism by which this happened was that the senate sold rights to manage and collect taxes from certain conquered lands, which only the richest of the aristocracy could pay. then they would extract taxes in excess of the price, allowing them to gradually consolidate wealth and get a much bigger proportion of the pie, not just a higher absolute amount. of note, the italians and socci were also getting shafted in various ways.
latins were like second-class romans that had most rights but couldn't vote.
socci were third-class subjects that were... around, with significantly fewer rights.
i can't remember all the details, but the gist is that tiberius gracchus was acutely aware of these problems and wanted to reform them by establishing a commission to handle land distribution, limit the amount of land any one person could have, privatize all remaining undistributed land and give it to romans (but not italians).
again long story short, this got him super murdered. and this was extremely shocking to the roman world. tiberius gracchus was very popular among the roman public, but by pushing his reforms very aggressively (and some would say illegally at times), he lost any support among the aristocracy and got lynched and thrown into the tiber (quite ironic for someone called tiberius! really an, really? yes.)
without any aristocratic allies, tiberius gracchus could be smeared to any extent as having become an enemy of rome. so his murderers were not punished, but rather seen as preserving the republic. his murderers not being punished has huge political ramifications.
tl;dr his brother gaius gracchus comes and tries something similar and gets killed again. like, absolute genius, didn't learn a thing. you could excuse tiberius, but what the hell was gaius thinking?? learn to keep support amongst the aristocracy you numbskull!
(also to be clear, the brothers were killed in confrontations that escalated, where they also navigated them dubiously. they were not secretly assassinated or killed by a random person.)
now the actually important end result of this is that two important politicians got absolutely murdered in public because they were too disruptive and because their reforms would have gotten them too much personal glory. from here on, rome never returns to normal. the overton window on the acceptability and gettingawayness of political murder is permanently shifted. every single politician knows this is now on table more than ever. even someone who wishes to use violence purely defensively is more likely to go on the offensive in this kind of political climate.
it is this political climate into which caesar is born. perhaps in another political climate, the republic would have survived caesar.

the book continues with caesar's early life and also sulla's civil war.
there are three actors here that must be known:

lucius cornelius sulla felix.
gaius marius.
lucius cornelius cinna.
Tl;dr these three people more or less destroy the republic before caesar even starts his political career proper. by the time they're done, rome has been marched on twice and the idea of rule of law looks like a joke.
as context, we must mention the social war.
the social war was an uprising of the socii (third-class roman subjects). there is evidence to support the belief that the way gracchus' agrarian reforms worked in practice helped cause the social war by redistributing lands that belonged to socii to romans. the spark for the social war was drusus advocating for granting citizenship to roman allies (socii and latins) and then subsequently being murdered.
in the aftermath of the war, rome was victorious but also decided during and after the war to grant a lot of the demands of their opponents, leading to many allies becoming enfranchised citizens. marius and sulla distinguished themselves in the social war (also cnaeus pompeius strabo but he matters less). sulla went on to be granted consulship and authority to command the war against king mithridates vi of pontus.
a tribune named sulpicius passed a bill in the popular assembly to essentially steal eastern command from sulla and give it to marius. the gracchi brothers had expanded, in practice, the power of the tribune, by limit testing what roman society would permit, and now this defacto expansion of power was being leveraged in a dangerous way. another bill was designed to spread newly enfranchised citizens more evenly across the voting tribes.
sulla opposed sulpicius's bill, but sulpicius backed his legal claim with mob violence. one story maintained that sulla barely escaped with his life by taking refuge in marius' house. sulla escaped to his legions that were given to him for the eastern war, then convinced them to march on rome.
this is the first time in history a roman army marched on rome. sulla won a battle against marius and sulpicius. sulla outlawed a dozen opposing leaders, marking them for death. sulpicius was killed by his own slaves (sulla freed gave the slave his freedom, then threw the man to his death from the tarpeian rock for his disloyalty)
marius escaped. sulla waged war on mithridates for almost five years.
cinna, a co-consul with sulla, had a falling out with him, and was declared an enemy of the republic after trying to undo sulla's legislation. cinna copied sulla and went to convince roman legions to march on rome. he was later joined by marius. marius and cinna marched on rome. again! wow these guys are speedrunning ruining the republic.
gnaeus octavius opposed cinna and marius and was killed in what is sometimes referred to as bellum octavianum (war of octavus). cinna's faction proceeds to deliberately kill many other political opponents and generally raise hell. this march on rome is generally regarded as having been even worse than the first one.
so now sulla's still out there fighting mithidrates, while cinna and marius are absolutely wrecking rome. it's perhaps unsurprising that cinna and marius get elected as consuls in 86bc! marius, being seventy, then croaks a few weeks after.
to speedrun the rest of the story, sulla comes back from the war and destroys cinna's faction. then becomes dictator and regular roman republicanism is partially suspended. this is hard on caesar because caesar was shown favor by cinna's faction. in particular sulla insists on caesar divorcing his wife, who was the daughter of cinna. caesar boldly rejects this command -- boldly because sulla had executed several dozen people for less by now. caesar goes into exile but eventually his mother and various politicians plead for his forgiveness and sulla does forgive him.
so this is the context in which caesar starts his political career -- rome got marched on twice, there's a goddamn dictator in power which exiles him, and he's seen more politicians gets persecuted, murdered or executed in a few years than past career politicians saw in their entire lives.
sulla crippled the tribunate by taking away its power to propose legislation to the assembly. the tribune was barred from ever pursuing other magistracies, effectively ensuring it would be a dead end political career choice. he also strengthened legislation against holding consecutive terms in various posts. he expanded the senate by 300 and ensured seats of power were filled with his supporters. sulla then retired, being able to actually walk through the streets without a bodygaurd and without fear of being assassinated.


caesar was hounded by accusations of having been nicomedes' bitchboy. this made caesar angry and the rumors were long lasting. there's no evidence of caesar having homosexual inclinations other than this case.
caesar had sex with a lot of women. i will spare him jokes about trying to overcompensate for something.
caesar became a very good orator and started his career in rhetoric by working as prosecuter.
there is a very juicy story of caesar getting kidnapped by pirates. he constantly berated them, engaged with them in athletic endeavors, wrote and read poetry (or was it some other writings?), and demanded that they ask for more ransom (20 vs 50 silver talents). he promised the men they'd be crucified and the pirates actually really liked caesar, or were at least amused. after he was ransomed, he levied a fleet, caught the pirates and crucified them (despite the ruler of the city or province not being interested in doing that -- caesar went to a different town and did it). it is said that caesar slit the throats of the men before crucifying them, sparing them of great pain. this combination of swift retribution mixed with clemency seems to have been exactly what caesar desired to evoke.
