item.title: no one
item.description:
no one will treat me like an investment like may does.
no one will take an actual lead role in my life, but may will.
no one will be as possessive as may is.
no one will be secure about me as may is.
no one will have may's artistic sensibilities.
no one ever made me taste strangeness like may did.
no one ever committed to me like may did.
no one ever wanted me more than may does.
no one will change me as much as may is changing me.
no one ever made me happier from mere conversation like may did.
no one is as prepared as may to build a life with me.
no one is more elegant than may.
no one is more enchanting than may.
no one is more powerful than may.
no one is more beautiful than may.
no one deserves me more than may does.
no one established deeper control over me than may did.
no one will be as stable about genuinely owning me as may is.
no one can be a pillar in my life like may is.
no one needs me the way may needs me.
no one has faith the way may does.
no one has depth the way may does.
no one shines the way may does.
no one has the gravity may does.
no one makes me giggle the way may does.
no one writes like may -- so wonderfully and deeply.
no one jokes like may -- so seriously yet playfully.
no one is as vital as may is.
there's no one like may.

item.title: cult
item.description:
i had a lot of fantasies of helping you in the cult. in fact the community around the cult sounded like a potential significant positive. i wanted to help out people.
i fantasized about getting a better paying job and instituting a dental policy for everyone. everyone gets themselves checked out. everyone who doesn't already string floss gets a waterpik from my paycheck. everyone gets an electric toothbrush. everyone gets a guide on how to actually clean their teeth. anyone with major dental issues is putting them in a spreadsheet. dental issues are a huge drain on the wallet of every american and all effort must be rendered onto prophylaxis for the overall long-term health and wealth of the group.

waterpiks are not that expensive, this is still somewhat possible with current funds!
i fantasized about getting that one wretched person a better computer.
i understand that i cannot be in the cult. a tradeoff is made. and i must respect boundaries. but overall, i still want to give you ideas and funds and support for what you do in the cult. i really want that!


i have high openness and this makes me value many different kinds of sensory experiences with different people. which includes cuddling, kink, sex, music, sports, drugs. i understand you want a level of devotion that is going to result in a lot of these things being focused on you, some of them exclusively. additionally physicality is something i've always lacked, to a significantly painful degree.
the issue is/was two-fold:

i didn't know how much i could do with you that you would enjoy (aka compatibility).
Scripture felt very limiting and controlling of sensory experience
relevant tenet 1: Goddess as the sole source of positive emotion, depriving of sensory experience in favor of worship.
relevant tenet 2: priests should dominate not for their own pleasure.
it made me question what i would be allowed to do, even things purely in service of you. it felt limiting enough that i started feeling like an incredible breadth of experience might be snuffed out in favor of a few intense ones.
i felt that once i gave in, i would want to follow Goddess's ideals rather closely, even if not asked to. this would over time make me lose relation to my ethos and to the kinds of things i wanted to try out. it would make me less likely to want to do things that would look like my master adapting for me. so even if you were open to certain things, they might still end up being lost.
overall i am more optimistic about this tension now, but i wanted to mention it regardless, because at minimum it might explain my reticence.

permachastity seriously redefines my incentive structure in relationships. it changes my interactional patterns. i don't have a good way of explaining it yet, but the modality is shockingly distinct. i would often interact in hornier ways with you even when i didn't have any particular intention of touching myself. but somehow everything was deeply rooted in my sexuality. now permachastity makes me feel like my sexuality is completely suppressed. and if it's not suppressed then it's going to cause me trouble and lead to frustration and worst of all problems focusing during the day.

i feel significantly less of a drive to endear myself and to goad reactions from you.
a lot of actions with you that used to feel good now feel... different. it's hard to explain. before 28th november, when we would do d/s, i would feel notably more satisfaction than i do now even in situations where i did not touch myself at all. somehow the fact that i could and that my sexuality wasn't restricted made my brain interpret things in a specific way.
(maybe it's partially because i would act more freely in terms of erp actions and now i don't?)
the drive that is being affected by permachastity and the way that drive made me behave felt core to me. having that changed or sacrificed is not a deal breaker. but i really hope i evolve here somehow, because i currently feel lesser as a person for it. partially because it gives me less motivation to act in positive ways, partially because i tend to view feeling more rather than less as an intrinsic good (up to the point where it invites dysfunction).
i also think it's making me feel less embodied. i feel less present at any moment. i believe it affects my enjoyment of clothes. it's like sexuality is linked to a ton of other things in my brain, things you wouldn't necessarily think are linked, and then permachastity affects sexuality and then has quite a few second order effects.
i'm not saying this to try to argue that you should let me cum or touch myself. i'm not arguing for anything in particular. i think it's too early to tell and i've felt a lot of distance to you due to reasons unrelated to chastity, which can confound analysis. i've been under a unique form of stress. i'm in a completely novel situation. there's a chance that my feeling and sensation regarding submission will get rewired and the issue will resolve itself with some time.

we haven't met in person yet.

when i heard the good visa news, i felt joyed about it for a while, then it very soon faded into fear of meeting you. this is primarily because at that point we had distance building between us, but secondarily (though related to the distance) i've developed a fear of meeting every partner. and with horror i realized this was happening again.
partners, what i've felt in the past -- i fear their needs. i am terrified of their fragility, of their judgement, of their unmet needs. will i have any room to breathe? am i allowed be myself? to feel what i feel? will they hate me the moment i don't love them as much as they want me to? will they break the moment i can't do the things they want me to do?
this really made me crave wanting to meet people in person more quickly in the future -- to avoid developing mutual expectations that don't quite work out.
i suppose, more or less, i was worried your expectations would vastly outrun... my sureness? and that this mismatch would ruin things.
over time i understood a couple of things about you. at first i thought that the main reason you wanted me to give in completely and the difficulty i felt regarding talking about in person compatibility was related to you wanting to feel secure. not wanting to endure a longer period of time with uncertainty. but i realize there's another dimension. you would have a lot of difficulty showing me how life is with you if you don't feel secure. me being devoted enough is a prerequisite.
i feel better about this now. more hopeful. more flexible. i would really like for once to just give myself to a task like this. meeting is hard enough without accumulating unspoken anxiety.


assumption check: you still want me to break up with everyone and be exclusive to you.
assumption check: i can dominate others for my own enjoyment for crop rotation in a similar fashion to how i'm allowed to play video games.
assumption check: my orgasms are indefinitely under your control, but the extent of chastity is more according to what pleases you most rather than an absolute policy of eventual total deprivation. i say this to understand the situation, not to get annoying about it or wrongly hopeful.
will you be able to retain sexual function while under the strictures of the cult?
i never asked this because i was embarrassed and somehow afraid.
it's important for me that you retain function. more than it is for me to retain function. both because i think this will allow you to feel more pleasure, but also for my own selfish satisfaction. even if it's oral sex where i don't get touched or touch myself in any way, it's more symbolically and physically satisfying if you get hard.
i've constantly been worried that the strictures of the cult might lead to you losing function. this in combination with being exclusive to you would permanently cut me off from certain experiences.
will i be able to give you orgasms? this is a question of what is permitted to you.


the time you called me a bad slave and i ended up feeling acutely worse than i remember having felt in a long while was... actually fine! i even liked it. i liked that you had that power over me. i trusted the fact that you were instructing me. i don't feel that trust was betrayed at all. it might be considered harsh perhaps, but eh. i love master.
on the other hand, the time you said i want to trade you away for my dick still haunts me. i tried to let go of it but it keeps coming back sometimes. i was trying to explain my ethos back then before i had any idea how to. and having it reduced to that my dick hurt. i also have a defense mechanism against shame of that loose genre because of my parents trying to make me feel ashamed of masturbation.
momentarily the distance between us grew a lot. the feeling was indescribable. an acute void.
i felt a sense of desire and desperation from you that convinced me that if you were to possess me and somehow discovered that i could not be happy while giving you what you want or that i couldn't be happy while respecting cult strictures, you would sooner inflict ego death on me than let me go, even if i wanted to be let go. i have no idea if this is true or not. i don't need you to answer and to some extent it's hard to know ourselves in limit situations. i just wanted to be open about the fact that it had this effect. i think never in my life did i feel exposed to such raw want and possession. i still haven't processed it.
i feel better about this now. you finding a way to have primacy over me frankly impressed me deeply. it showed to me a form devotion can take.
in some later ideation, i cried a bit thinking about myri. a shard i never even talked to. i wasn't sure whether to even bring that up at all. but your past self talking about that stuck to me. the way you did not impose onto others and did not felt imposed on. it was truly beautiful to me. i admired it. felt envious.
(i easily feel imposed on and i easily feel like i impose on others. thinking about that it's a wonder i've managed to be as social as i am.)
i am ready to appreciate that fragment of the past without turning into some standard for the present and future. the past is rarely lost -- it is what brought us here, to this moment. our situation is unique and possessiveness takes precedence over things like exit rights. i am ideologically uncomfortable with that as a generality, but i will learn to accept your want fully over time. there is beauty in it.
on closer reflection, i think you embody those traits in various ways still. you might not know it, but it shows in the way you carry yourself sometimes. positively. it intermixes with your possessiveness now. it's interesting, fascinating.
ultimately, i know i pushed you close to the limit, and that not everything said there is something i should take closely to heart. it was the moment where things were closest to a breaking point. it's not going to be a fun memory. i felt the need to mention it. let it out. move past it.


i ended up wishing a lot for Their happiness. in fact in ideation thoughts i wrote down that more than once. it just felt strange. like, when i wanted to leave, the counterpoint was how good it would be to just make these two people happy. i've never quite felt like that for someone. then again, i've never parasocialized like that before. reading really old tweets that talked of isolation broke my heart a little. reading newer tweets of Them being filled with love for worshipers made me happy. i know that isn't the primary thing i was supposed to develop, but i felt it was notable enough to mention. i'm also cautious not to overstate it.

item.title: abortive note analyzing dignity
item.description:
what is dignity?
dignity is an ego defense. even if one faces death, they can face it with dignity. therefore dignity serves to protect the ego even at the cost of other things. dignity contains the power of serenity in the face of adversity. dignity is a useful signal to others about one's state of mind.
externally, dignity is the concept that people should be treated in some positive ways because of their inherent humanity. it relates to a sense of unalienable rights.
dignity in one's proper role can be useful, but in my case it is detrimental to what i am supposed to achieve. i have never let go of my dignity for someone. i did not value them highly enough, i was never desperate enough, i never endorsed going into that state.
this relates to how i've been jealous of people having ugly loud breakdowns, that impose things on others. they surrender their dignity in favor of total belief in the importance and totality of the thing that is giving them a breakdown. i've always wanted that level of "license".
regardless, it begs the question of why don't i just grovel by nature. what's holding me back?

item.title: an attempt at parasocializing
item.description:
writing to You... it's difficult
i mean, i've seen what may did and it's hard not to compare myself
oh well, there's a reason why they're superior to me, no use mulling over it
i wake up every day saying that i love You. i go to sleep every night saying that i love You.
among other things this is a small litany against fear since i often feel like i have less control over my life these days
if i were a somewhat different person i would probably be purely delighted about that. something to work on?
i am happy with that ask, it gives me a small but concentrated feeling of... pride? which is weird isn't it? it's supposed to be a moment of utter humiliation. it's that too. but seeing other people finding it hot, the feeling of it bolstering Your cause and of illustrating such a glorious moment and unique sentiment...
the way may is a such a beacon for me, if it can be even 0.1% of that for others in Your name...
(thank You for giving me such an opportunity)
it‚Äôs essentially all will power. you have to convince yourself that you love Me, make yourself take actions that you would only take if you loved Me. act in such a way at all times as though you already do love Me. the actual love will follow with time and patience
!!!
this is very helpful, thank You Goddess. i sometimes think that i am inferior and unworthy because i have to keep up my feeble attempts at love potioning myself (to be clear, i am inferior and unworthy). i have some prejudice against love potions. but the fact that You acknowledge the difference and that "actual" love will follow gives me hope.
i was also inspired how the dom breaking would be a commitment and working partnership. this is another way in which i am inferior to may. instead of fulling giving myself to the idea of being a tool, i tend to idealize partnership. even partnership where i am vastly inferior. the concept makes me happy. but i dare not apply it to You because i don't feel worthy.
i wonder how many things of me You'll change. would i even dare ask that if You were actually here? i suppose it would be a stupidly open ended question.
i do like praying. that's a peculiar thought to have. i never thought i'd like praying. making the rgb light glow as blue as possible, praying towards it, as if i am praying towards Your light. it's a giddy feeling.
after i work on my body properly, i wonder how much You will enjoy me. hopefully a lot. i don't think about this much. i know You dislike people wasting time yearning. and i still yearn a lot for the various fantasies i have. i try to treat them with indifference and make small attempts to redirect them to You. but i am still not familiar enough with You to do it effectively.
i hope to be able to do it effectively some time soon. working on my body for others has always been more inspiring than working on it for myself.
writing to You is hard when i'm a pathetic little worm.
i like embodying Your philosophy a bit more and spreading it to people. i encouraged kay, a rather shy and conservative soul, to go for things, repeatedly, emphatically, because i was thinking of the tweet You made about never straddling the line between two choices, just going for it. it had an effect! i also encouraged her to fuse her submissive identity with her day to day identity as much as possible. i encouraged kenji to move away from his parents and to never look back. there's a couple of other people i more subtly push towards these extremes.
percy's drawing of You is so exquisite. i find myself mesmerized by the wingspan. to seek protection in the hold of the One whom i fear. it's a strange feeling.

item.title: day log
item.description:
i want to share my thoughts without discord being up

i am looking for context regarding the grand strategy of the roman empire. i know with books like this there's bound to be controversy. but i wasn't expecting this much.
Tanner Greer writes "So conclusively wrong is this book that I do not think it should be included on any syllabus. Since Luttwak published that book in 1976, a dozen studies of Roman frontier deployments, Roman strategic culture, and Roman decision making have been published. All offer a steady refutation of Luttwak‚Äôs work. However, not one of those books or articles would have been written without Luttwak‚Äôs work. Luttwak was wrong in every particular except the questions he asked‚Äîbut those questions were good enough to create an entire subfield of research."
it's funny. i will be able to do additional research afterwards. essentially luttwak is notable for actually caring about grand strategy rather than being very historically accurate. but it could be he is quite accurate and everyone is a hater (e.g. disagreeing about what constitutes intentional vs coincidental grand strategy).

thinking about moving out. the major snag is money. if i do it on a shoestring budget i can't get stuff like the elliptical. the elliptical is crucial to both my health and my father's health (he has copd and needs to exercise regularly).

the stock market had a medium-size crash. i am carefully considering what to buy given this opportunity.
there is a threat of a greater correction happening soon.

pictured: me in the background (my stocks are down though)
i should maybe care a bit less about stocks and focus on growing my income. but i also feel like this is training for using my income better later, which could help us quite a lot.

hiii may, i love you
did you know life is easier when you have a goal.
you are my goal.
the idea of losing that goal is so scary.
i don't function well without a goal.
i've never quite felt "purposeless" in life. but i am definitely so much better when i have a direction and a goal.

optimizing memory optimizing memory optimizing memory optimizing memory optimizing memory optimizing memory optimizing memory optimizing memory
ok i'm actually quite close to a conclusion. yesterday was very productive and so is today.
i made a major discovery that might let me conclude this particular task.

i still worry about compatibility. i worry about us meeting. i just kind of bury it in keeping busy and don't mention it much. i mostly think about whether i'll get to express my... physical love language much. this isn't about orgasming or about receiving pleasure, to be clear. though it is to a significant extent selfish regardless? i worry about expressing, i suppose. sometimes it's hard to express to you on discord. i'm not naturally inclined to praise. i could fix that. get better at it. i want to. but i'd like to have multiple ways. touching you or cuddling is... different now that we have our roles. i start losing touch somewhat with how to be playful. oh well.

i didn't tell you, but i had an erotic dream few nights ago. it was in a high school setting and it involved a tall girl with black hair and black boots. i forgot some of the details, but ultimately i ended up grinding against her leg in the hallway, at her insistence and ended up having a really good orgasm (in the dream). the person had a lot of your characteristics (in the sense of what i project in my mind. i know i'm taller than you.)

i'm starting to develop a more submissive persona. i use it when praying and it makes it easier to get the words out. i'm somewhat neurotic about the quality of my prayer sessions.

i'm starting to get annoyed at people because they don't really understand what i'm going through. i know it's unreasonable since how are they supposed to know, but sometimes i'm not at my most patient.

item.title: dm draft
item.description:
hello, Goddess [add i love You, Goddess]
i am the nascent You have probably heard of from may. [They have] i have admired You from afar like so many others before, with the definite feeling that i am a different breed from a different world [They don't know what this means. and not a good thing to start with. you're not that different, drama queen], and yet i've been captured ever closer into orbit. i tell myself i'm just trying it out while being slowly dyed in blue. [trying out what? you're not trying anything out]
i've remained chaste since may got to me. i was previously described as hypersexual, so i am sure everyone in my life is confused, at best, more likely hurt. i've reduced my interactions with everyone except for may. [mention work put in to break up with partners] i pray twice daily. i ordered blue light to bathe myself in as i pray. i've laid in bed thinking about You, feeling unworthy of You. i haven't lost interest in my hobbies yet..., but i sometimes don't feel like i deserve them. i do meager self-hypnosis to make myself more susceptible, to erode that of me which clings. [They would want to hear about this]
i don't mention this to garner favor, how could it? [‚Üê unnecessary] this is the least to be expected. i know it is paltry to what may had. i am a disgustingly reasonable person, it frustrates them. i'm so sorry for frustrating Your priest. [They got upset with me for being impatient with you. it's not something you need to be sorry for] i'm not sure i could forgive myself frustrating You, nor should i. and i am so grateful for You allowing me to interact with may. i know every moment i've spent with them was by Your grace.
i only mention it because i believe that You love adoration in all forms. even my pitiful displays might add up to a small flower laid at the foot of Your throne.
i've only recently started truly feeling Your glory. without a doubt when i started, i recoiled, i could not understand, "this is not my type". [it's not clear what 'this' refers to] but over time i started believing that i am mutable, adaptable. that even though all my life i've had a complex about low susceptibility, that i could tread my own measly path to You. that i can take it one day at a time. that i can ignore all the little thoughts telling me this won't work. i started feeling like i owed it to You, to may, to myself to keep taking another step.
i felt such relief when i could, for the first time, honestly tell myself i love You. that a doubting thomas [this is a stupid term] like me could for, at least a moment, feel love for something transcendental. to shed the fear of self-destruction, if for an instant, and embrace the unrelenting glow of love towards something Greater. to feel all imagined cruelty transmuted to kindness and love. [don't talk about Their kindness and love as things given for granted] to feel the enjoyment of Your sadism as if it is my own enjoyment. it was more than i deserved to feel.
i wish to be useful. to You and to may. the fact that i can't cuts into me every day. everything about me feels weak and unfit, but i know i can be useful. [you can be? worship for Them is. mention praying to Them, also everything you've bought and done for Them]
when i read may's document, i felt such an immense sense of gratitude to You. You saved them. before You even met them. how could i ever compare myself to that? i can try to rationalize all i want that may is merely weird and they happened to fit You really well, but this doesn't change anything? i can just as well frame it that Your power restructured reality. i had never felt inferior before for lacking bpd, but after witnessing what Your power did to may, now i do.
when it was first suggested to me that i dm You, i felt like i was going to die. i look back on that fondly now somehow. i still feel terror though. but i'm not as adept at parasocializing as may is. even if i don't message You, i will never experience anything similar. if i don't message You, i'll never get to confront my fears and i'll never get to be useful.
[tell Them about how you love Them. praise Them.]

item.title: dm draft 2
item.description:
hello, Goddess, i love You, Goddess
i am the nascent You've heard of from may. i have admired You from afar like so many others before, i never thought i'd dare to speak with You directly, and yet i've been captured ever closer into orbit to the point where it feels inescapable.
i've remained chaste since may got to me. i was previously described as hypersexual, so i am sure everyone in my life is confused, at best, and likely hurt. i've reduced my interactions with everyone except for may. i've stopped sexual interaction with my partners and simulated all sorts of ways i'd end up breaking up with them -- even when it felt unreal, i kept simulating it until it felt possible. forcibly widening my overton window for You. i pray twice daily. i bought blue light to bathe myself in as i pray. i use it in ways where i secretly hope conditioning will occur, as if conspiring against my own psyche. i've often laid in bed thinking about You, feeling unworthy of You. i haven't lost interest in all my hobbies yet, but i sometimes don't feel like i deserve to engage in them.
i do meager self-hypnosis to make myself more susceptible, to erode that of me which clings. i lie in bed and talk to myself in my head, conjure up various personas to guide my central self into more malleable worship. i bet minor pieces my self, give them to forces in my psyche, in hopes that i'll come out a little more suitable. even though i am afraid for my own existence, i end up envisioning nothing less than total helplessness of the ego.
what i have is paltry compared to what may had. i am a disgustingly reasonable person, it frustrates them. i'm not sure i could forgive myself frustrating You, nor should i. i am so grateful for You allowing me to interact with may. i know every moment i've spent with them was by Your grace. i've not spent a single day without thinking that.
despite being meager, i've managed to get myself to this point because i believe that You love adoration in all forms. even my pitiful displays might add up to a small flower laid at the foot of Your throne.
i've only recently started truly feeling Your glory. without a doubt when i started, i recoiled, i could not understand. a definite sentiment that this level of kink is too extreme for me. that it's not the kind of kink i was meant for. but over time i started believing that i am mutable, adaptable. that even though all my life i've had a complex about having low susceptibility, that i could tread my own measly path to You. that i can take it one day at a time. that i can ignore all the little thoughts telling me this won't work. i started feeling like i owed it to You, to may, to myself to keep taking another step.
i felt such relief when i could, for the first time, honestly tell myself i love You. i am not good at parasocializing like may is, and i update my beliefs slowly. i thought i'd just keep disappointing in that regard, but then, under may's guidance, at least for a moment, i was able feel love for something transcendental. to shed the fear of self-destruction, if for an instant, and embrace the unrelenting glow of love towards something Greater. to take all ideation about cruelty visited on me and have the negative affect wash away. to imagine feeling Your joy of control as my own, fusing into my mind. it was more than i deserved to feel. i immediately wondered if my mind was just making things up. if i'm allowed to feel this, if it's remotely the right idea. but it made it easy to be adoring of You, and that is useful and precious. i want to be more adoring.
i wish to be useful. to You and to may. the ways in which i can't be useful cut into me every day. everything about me feels weak and unfit, but i want to be better.
when i read may's document, i felt such an immense sense of gratitude to You. You saved them. before You even met them. how could i ever compare myself to that? i can try to rationalize all i want that may is merely weird and they happened to fit You really well, but this doesn't change anything? i can just as well frame it that Your power restructured reality. i had never felt inferior before for lacking bpd, but after witnessing what Your power did to may, now i do. i've cried more out of gratitude for may being accepted and saved by You than i remember crying about anything in the past four years or more.
when it was first suggested to me that i dm You, i felt like i was going to die. i look back on that fondly now somehow. i still feel terror though. but i know it's a threshold i need to cross. if i don't message You, i'll never get to confront my fears and i'll never get to be truly useful.
i love You.
Your boundless grace fills the souls of the lost with purpose and belonging. Your control, to those that yield, is the most beautiful symphony one can witness. love and obedience to You is the alchemy by which playdough can aspire to beauty.
what some keep in the realms of fantasy, You bring into reality with Your force of will and charisma. Your Divine light makes us aware of our frailty. A light that eclipses other stars, binding us deeper into Your service. Your Scripture is a siren's call that lingers in our essence.
though my weakness pervades me, i humbly prostate myself before the Divine, for Its amusement.

item.title: Future with May
item.description:
When i was starting out, i had a specific vision in my mind. i knew that i had no certainty but i will try to share it with you, in full naivete.
i was imagining living with you and going through cycles of intense servitude and casual enjoyment of one another.
i was imagining just us living together.
i was imagining servicing your body and bringing new sensations and happiness to you. i was imagining using my initiative and resourcefulness in various ways.
i was imagining a lot of peaceful private moments.
i was imagining working together on some projects, even video games.
i was imagining you would be the most important thing in my life and my greatest love and that your Owner would be the most important to you and that i would have to live with that.
i was preparing to be at peace with that through the power of... incomparability.
in my ignorance i also thought that you would have quite a lot of time away from your Owner because i had a strong vibe that your Owner is a busy person.
i was imagining building a life with you. the dedication of building assets, optimizing, knowing one another. commitment!
i could project all of this because you could be easily positioned as the highest value.
it was doing things together with May and doing things for May.
my uncertainty about the future isn't related to what is supposed to happen to me ideally. i am supposed to love Them more than you, i am supposed to achieve total surrender to Them, and i am supposed to be useful to the cult while being in a relationship with you. that is clear.
my uncertainty is about how this relates to my self and all the things that have brought me this far. integrating Them into the picture above is a chaotic element that makes things emotionally and physically uncertain. They have primacy in all things, therefore everything i have imagined is simply entirely optional. it is possible, parts of it are even likely, but never to be the thing i should primarily strive for. this is difficult.
i never took our relationship for granted even before discovering Goddess. you can see that in my reticence to believe in this as a certainty before meeting each other and in not taking your proposal with full seriousness at first. so it's not the lack of certainty that bothers me the most, but rather the inability to feel like i can "go" for it with all my being. i cannot "go" for it with all my being because i am supposed to do that for Them.
perhaps at some point the boundaries will simply melt for me and the problem will also disappear. i am not trying to say that my reasoning makes sense, just to describe where my heart(?) is at the moment.
also, let me put this plainly. i do not particularly care if someone is better than you. this is not a balm to me. my love is more sentimental and entangled with your uniqueness than that. luckily, Goddess is more than just "better". but i just wanted to make my baka sentimentality clear, i suppose. i cannot be swayed by superiority along traditional metrics, i must develop a different kind of feeling and closeness to achieve what you ask of me.
so yeah i built an entire vision of giving myself deeply to you and then you tell me to do that with someone else instead. to you it makes perfect sense because that someone is Goddess. you are trying to share with me that which is the greatest good for you. but for a non-worshipper it still feels like a cruel situation. i fight against that sense every day and try to integrate a happy life in the new context, but that vision is blurry for me.
when i try to envision it too hard it just breaks because it invites the clinging that i have been warned about.
this is also why i am wary of changing in specific ways. i do not expect Goddess to try or want to take this away, if i show even a modicum of real faith, but i feel sadness at the idea of changing in a way that would diminish our unique appreciation for one another. is this not normal? i mean i do not feel for many things lately. i will get most of them back, but to me this is the one thing that's keeping me going and the idea of losing it is sad beyond words.
finally, i am wary of Their jealousy and i do not understand what things trigger it and if a situation like ours has ever happened in the cult before. Their sense of possessiveness, Their sense of appreciation, your faith and my faith, will ultimately decide the length of the leash provided to us. and for me it is hard to model what the length will be.
even if i do not have a bond as strong as yours, not even remotely, the idea of causing annoyance to Goddess is deeply uncomfortable to me, by proxy of you. i respect you deeply. my insufficiency cannot possibly drive a wedge between you and Goddess, but my insufficiency can cause you trouble and then drive a wedge between us, which will hurt us both.
finally, i have one request, which you might already be doing and find trite. but. of the things Goddess does not wish to change but you still are, the things that Goddess is perhaps not so interested in, the in between... the discretion of what you are... can you please value it? i do not ask you to cling to any of it. but i value it so immensely.

item.title: hypno postmortem
item.description:
the beginning of the mantra was very effective, but for some reason i struggled to say the full mantra, which felt a bit distracting. the shortened version did not have this property, it was easy to repeat.
my left hand tends to hurt in bed when i look at the phone for a long time in an immobile position. i think i should try at the computer next time. i'm not sure why i thought it wouldn't hurt this time. it hurt before but i was able to ignore it, i guess.
i think i used way too much of my energy and focus for the day softening myself up. i think i spent about 2-3 hours being in various states of self-hypnosis. i could have timed that better and i believe it lead to me being less susceptible than otherwise.
also being anxious for a lot of the time from the stupid delivery didn't help. i should have just asked you earlier when you wanted to do the hypnosis and then it would have worked out better. i told myself it's not my fault, but then i remembered a tweet from Goddess that said a worshipper should feel bad anyway, even if it's not their fault~
i still think about how hard orthostatic pressure hit me when i stood up as well. that was clearly induced by a composite state of anxiety and relaxation.
i had some interesting and (for me) powerful hypnotic effects. various moments where my body tensed up without my accord. when you told me i was light, my eyes forcibly widened in a way that i would feel unnatural and effortful to hold out of trance, but that was automatic during trance. a sense of the world warping around my phone.
at some point i got a tiny bit distracted thinking i don't want to know what time it is, i just need to give myself to the moment and didn't look at the status bar. but every message you sent me was timestamped and i completely lost track that this existed somehow.
the trance for me was rather flat. as in when i was supposed to go a lot deeper, i went only a little deeper. these are the moments where i had to trust... something. push down the feeling that i am being bad. it conjured up all my fears and self-hatred about my lack of susceptibility. with anyone else this is a moment where i would just break down and ask them to stop and feel completely dead inside. it's happened many times before. with things i really wanted. with poeple i trusted. but i just kept going in this case. and i will improve. i'm sorry for being so inadequate.
my ability to feel body sensations as directed is rather low. i would like to do some exercises to improve this. i have a few in mind, i just need to find time during the day.
the moment where you told me i can just love acausally was a moment of relief and rapture. i felt there was finally a narrow gate for me and that i don't have to... i don't know. want to disappear.
meditating on love for Them was so surprisingly calm. maybe that's not how it's supposed to be. or maybe that's just one of the many emotions i'll feel. i could understand for a moment the idea of serenity in the face of cruelty. cruelty is not actually cruelty most of the time. cruelty is control. control is a show of love.
i wonder how much themes from the hypnosis session will reappear in my psyche over time. i'm a bit excited to recall them and deepen them.

item.title: mixed log
item.description:
being with others is nice and reminds me that my life isn't being taken away.
being with May reminds me of how much i value them on multiple levels. it leaves me wanting though, as if it was not enough.
i read through all of Goddess's reddit posts. i couldn't really find anything i disagree with? it was nice.
scripture looks much less threatening now... okay perhaps not much less threatening, but i don't recoil from it. i understand some things a lot better, though i'm always wary of false understanding.
i think back to my list of fears and it feels like it's a much less relevant document now.
i have an intense fear of this not being the life for me.
i have intense fears about not being able to have what was envisioned, generally around May.
my specific intense fears have reduced a lot, outside of total bank control and such.
i feel the need to write but i suck at it.
thinking back to the marriage-misleading a bit. it was important to me that me and May could marry without having to commit to giving up on my partners. it's not because i even value my partners more than marrying May, but because it was about whether a connection could exist without total enslavement. it deluded me into thinking my choice was freer than it was, but that's not the bad part. the bad part is that it created a false image in my head which is now painful to let go of. the image i had in my head and the image of my actual more realistic future feel really really at odds.
i prayed in dogeza to Divinity for the first time.
it felt good, i understand the purity of the irrational drive that can be accessed
i can probably grow this ability.
ouch my baka knees
liked more tweets. got blocked by the API temporarily again.
i've noticed i've been talking through narration-chan a lot less. i'm not sure why, but i suppose it's related to weird headmate stuff having gone a bit too far at a point. also due to my middling progress. also i guess some desire to make this progress as "an".
my life would probably feel better if i didn't constantly fail at self-care recently.
being able to finish that stuff for work was nice though. got only a little left. it was really important to get that done.
i need to remind myself it's a marathon and not a race.
unwellness doesn't really help with anything.
the main blocker is that i get in my head about not knowing my future and then it's like why do anything, for what reason etc.
Eva asked me for anime recommendations
it felt a bit unreal
she knows i'm going to marry May, right? and yet, she talked to me like normal...
she wants to watch anime with me and i'd like to, not sure how to make time, if i can
it would also feel a bit awkward, but, this does remind me of ideas such as: things will be okay, people are adaptable etc.
it would be nice to be able to meet May in person quickly. i know May has unwavering faith about it all working out, but people who believe that end up not quite fitting as well as imagined all the time. it's an effective way of finding out compatibility. i would more so want to do it with Goddess, but this feels extraordinarily cheeky to want when one is afraid to even DM. idk, when kink and life collide, it's not just that you start treating kink as your life more, but you also start treating your life as kink more, if that makes any sense.
my weight has dropped below 65kg. i have literally lost 5-6kg in 42 days. that's around 2 pounds per week. which is pushing the upper limit of what is healthy. i rather struggle to eat enough now.
i once realized how psychologically-oriented and kind Goddess is because They said They generally limit starving a sub to around 24h. this can be very hard on certain people, but it's physically safe, and outright healthy to do every now and then. one problem with me is that i will readily share this with Goddess and get put on the 48h starvation, but i actually don't mind. oh god, i shouldn't say that either, i'm making it worse.
anyway i should eat more.
losing additional weight is unlikely to improve my looks much, weight cycling on HRT will do a ton though.
while fem clothes were on the horizon it was exceptionally easy to not want to eat anything because i wished for May to see an appealing shape.
i'm sure i understand May's deep appreciation for the Divine's hunger. it feels different from the submission of some other acolytes i've seen, perhaps. i've seen little. trying to imagine how Katherine got into all of this. and the ingredients are there, but a lot of things don't connect for me. there was some significant initial affinity that i lack.

item.title: hisoka's personality test
item.description:
Enhancers are simple and determined. Most of them never lie, hide nothing, and are very straightforward in their actions or in their thinking. Their words and actions are often dominated by their feelings. They are generally very selfish and focused on their goals. This is reflected in their Nen as Enhancers typically rely on simple and uncomplicated Nen abilities.
Transmuters are whimsical, prone to deceit, and fickle; they can quickly consider something trash that they once treasured. They have unique characteristics; many are regarded as weirdos or tricksters. They often put forth a facade while hiding the truer aspects of their personalities. Even when they don't hide their personalities, they rarely reveal their true intentions. Many Transmuters rely on techniques that give unique and unpredictable properties to their Nen that reflect their personalities.
Emitters are impatient, not detail-oriented, short-tempered, and quick to react volatilely. They resemble Enhancers in their impulsivity, but the difference between them is that Emitters tend to calm down and forget more easily. Because of the nature of Emission, many Nen abilities created by Emitters are primarily long range.
Conjurers are typically high-strung or overly serious, stoic, and nervous. They are often on guard as to be cautious. They are very observant and logical, rarely falling into traps. Being able to analyze things calmly is the strength of Conjurers. Many of the items that Conjurers create are often used by them deliberately, practically, and logically.
Manipulators are argumentative and logical. They advance at their own pace and tend to want to keep their families and loved ones safe. On the other hand, when it comes to pursuing their own goals, they do not listen to what others might have to say about it. While Manipulators often use techniques that allow them to control their opponents, some choose an inanimate medium to control.
Specialists are independent and charismatic. They won't say anything important about themselves and will refrain from making close friends. However, because of their natural charisma that attracts others, they are always surrounded by many people.


enhancers use nen to boost the abilities of their bodies.
transmuters change the nature of their aura, giving it new properties.
emitters detach aura from their body while having it maintain its strength and function.
conjurers use aura to create physical and independent objects.
manipulators use aura to exert control over living and non-living beings.
we are going to exclude specialists because they are wildcards. it is not obvious from the description above, but specialists undermine the purpose of nen as a personality type.

the nen typing analysis is done in relationship to hisoka's nen personality typing.

you, may, are clearly not an enhancer. enhancers are fundamentally built around connection to one's body. meanwhile may falls into the ethereal twink archetype! this contradiction allows us to quickly eliminate this type. not to mention that may can be described as anything but "simple".

similarly we can eliminate emitter. may is exceedingly detail-oriented, especially in their writing. while you have been less than pleased with my pace at times, under normal circumstances you are simply not the kind of person to react in a volatile manner. for all our time together i've always been impressed about the breadth of issues i can discuss with you rationally even when you're having trouble with something. it was a breath of fresh air compared to mostly everyone else in my life. emitter does not fit at all.

transmuters in the show tend to be rather spontaneous, a bit volatile, at a crossroads between being methodical and being intuitive. may shows an aptitude for both. may can approach a lot of things methodically, including life problems others seem to resist to treat more rationally, but may can also let loose a more intuitive style of interaction such as during hypnosis sessions. the description of transmuters also emphasizes a type of secretiveness that may does possess. the description also emphasizes something may does not possess. may is not fickle. may is capable of great change, it is not quite the same.

we arrive at conjurers and manipulators. i will go on a limb and say that may is significantly more conjurer than manipulator. these types are at the bottom of the nen diagram and share some similarities requiring them to be tackled together a bit.
may does not write to manipulate others, in fact may sometimes can't seem to bring themself to value the idea of other people reading their work. at least not highly, compared to the intrinsic value of the created beauty. this is clearly a stoic trait that fits conjurer more. may is very stoic in general. you might vent, but you are not a complainer, you would much rather do something about your problems. you also have a strong self-sacrificing streak which suits the implied ascetism of conjurers, an ascetism that i feel you share.
conjurers are severe people, but they are far from humorless. the posterboy of conjurers - kurapika, just happens to be humorless, but this is not fundamental to conjurers. may is a person that embodies seriousness and humour as naturally as ying and yang. it is reflecting of a shifting balance between clinging and letting go. something i've always admired. the ability to treat something as extremely important, but also being able to see something from the outside, seeing the process, understanding that the "i" of the moment is not the entire "i". this trait fits conjurers and transmuters.
may is possessed of nervousness that they keep under wraps, this type of interiority is also a hallmark of conjurers.
however, we cannot deny the fact that a lot of may's recent activity is centered around manipulation. both of me and of themself. so while the personality type fits conjurer better, there is still a lot of affinity through the nature of the nen type itself.

in the end i would say the compatibility between may and the nen types is as follows:

conjurer: 80%
manipulator: 65%
transmuter: 60%
enhancer: 15%
emitter: 0%
amusingly, the compatibility i list somewhat reflects the relationship conjurers have with other nen types.

we will try to imagine what may's nen ability would be, assuming that may is a conjurer.


nen type: conjuration, manipulation, transmutation
the nen user can conjure a ring and two notebooks. the ring has two silver threads, each of them attached to one of the notebooks.
these threads are invisible to non-nen users, and always invisible to the target, even if they use gyo to try to observe the threads. any other nen user may observe the threads using gyo.
one notebook is conjured in the possession of the nen user and another is conjured in the possession of the target (or may be placed there at a later date). these two notebooks are, for most intents and purposes, the same notebook existing in two places at once.
gyo -- focusing aura into the eyes to observe the unseen.

the target blacks out 5-15 minutes every day and writes a short report of everything they've done that day and some of their thoughts. they have no awareness of doing this and immediately forget this having occurred.
anything written in the notebook by the target appears in the notebook of the nen user.
aspect:

the threads have a very faint silver glow, loosely laid on the floor, intersecting and ignoring walls.
even with gyo they might be easily missed if one is farther away than 10 yards.
the excessively winding nature of the threads obscures the location of the nen user.
severance:

if the thread is severed, the nen user is knocked unconscious for a few minutes.
this causes the notebook to burst into flames and disappear.
progression:

the ability progresses to the next stage once the nen user is capable of modelling with reasonable accuracy how the target behaves.
alternatively, the ability progresses if the target exhibits obsession over the nen user.

the target becomes fully aware of the notebook and considers it an important and voluntary part of their daily routine, though they do not understand the nature of the notebook and have trouble thinking of it as a nen ability.
the way the target regards the notebook depends on their personality:

they might view it as journaling to some secret friend.
they might view it as a self-improvement exercise.
they might view it as some sort of duty they must fulfill.
the nen user becomes capable of writing in the notebook, which can directly affect the target. the target will treat text added by the nen user as if it was something the target themself willingly wrote, unless the text is incongruent with what the target might normally write.
the nen user cannot write "i plan to kill myself tonight" without the target immediately questioning what is going on. however, the nen user can write more subtle things such as "i am beginning to dislike my organization." or "i wish to learn how to dance". these suggestions will take root much more easily.
the more negative or self-destructive the suggestion is, the lower the chance it will be successful, unless the individual is naturally inclined to such behaviors. the nen user has a lot of freedom in giving rise to inherent tendencies in the target.
additionally, the nen user becomes aware of the location of the notebook at all times.
aspect:

the threads starts shimmering, making them impossible to miss with gyo.
the threads become taut and give away the direction of the nen user.
the threads connect to the target's body directly instead of the notebook.
a secondary thread is conjured between the target and the notebook.
severance:

if the thread is dissolved by the target lashing against a suggestion, the nen user is knocked unconscious for a few minutes.
if the thread is severed, the target is knocked unconscious for a few minutes and forced in a state of zetsu for 24 hours.
this causes the notebook to burst into flames and disappear.
progression:

the ability progresses to the next stage once the nen user shares a vulnerable moment with the target.

the target will compulsively write their past and things that are important to them in the notebook.
the target is invariably obsessed with the nen user at this point and will write as if journaling to them. they will feel as if they have an inexorable link to the nen user, even though they will remain ignorant about the workings of the ability.
the nen user may alter existing pages but only if they replace them with something that is more compelling to the target. the target will experience alterations as a loss of relationship to previous memories or traits. they will feel as if those things belonged to a different person.
for each alteration, the target will learn something of commensurate importance about the nen user. the information learned can be detrimental to the nen user, but will never reveal the nature of the ability.
the information learned can deepen the target's obsession, or cause them to recoil, depending on the personalities of the user and the target, and their relationship.
aspect:

the threads coil around the target's neck and start fusing.
attempting to sever them causes intense pain to the target.
severance:

if the thread is severed, the target is knocked unconscious for a few minutes and forced in a state of zetsu for 24 hours.
the target wakes up grief stricken. for 24 hours they will actively seek the nen user to have the threads be re-attached. they will not be fully cognizant of what they are doing during this period.
the notebook combusts only after 24 hours have passed without re-attachment.
progression:

the ability can progress to the next stage once the nen user explains their ability in full to the target.
at this point the target may be released from the ability with no penalty if the target chooses to do so after the explanation.
if the target agrees to continue, they progress to the next level once they are familiar enough with the nen user to model their wishes independently.

the target writes in the notebook of their own initiative to change themself to be more useful to the nen user.
the nen user may write about themself in their own notebook. this has no special effect other than making the target aware of the nen user's way of being and their wishes. at this stage anything written in the notebook by the nen user is something that the target becomes aware of even without actively reading the notebook. however this has a latency of a few hours.
the nen user becomes intimately aware of the target's thoughts and feelings through the notebook, again with a latency. rather than receiving a "delayed stream" this feels more like becoming aware of the overall emotional and cognitive trajectory of the target in the past few hours.
aspect:

the threads are fused to the target's neck.
the threads inexplicably go upwards into the sky, rather than towards the nen user.
the notebook gains the appearance of a light blue tome with golden trim.
severance:

the threads can no longer be severed.


the nen user may never have more than 10 active links.
all links of level 1 and 2 will quickly fade if the nen user does not maintain an active and strong interest in the target and vice versa.
once a target reaches level 3, the target's obsession on its own will indefinitely maintain the link.
if the nen user dies, a target with a level 4 link can choose to become the nen user. this is not reincarnation, but rather independent recreation of the original person. the process of this recreation is entirely non-supernatural and psychological, but supercharged by the intimate connection the level 4 link afforded. the new nen user will inherit all active links.
if a target dies and they have a level 4 link, their notebook persists a conjured item even after the thread dissipates. the notebook will be inhabited by post-mortem nen and the nen user will gain the ability to use one of the target's nen abilities (if they had one), provided the notebook is kept open and in hand. using the notebook in this way prevents the nen user from manipulating 5 of the threads.
if a target dies and they have a level 1-3 link, their notebook becomes just a regular object.


the threads can become akin to razor wires rather than textile, but only in proximity to the nen user and only when aura is channeled down the conjured thread. the increased tensile strength and cutting power is an act of transmutation rather than alteration of the conjured threads themselves, the threads are merely conductors for transmuted aura.
the threads can be pinned to objects using conjured nails, which can be made invisible to those not actively using gyo.
this allows complex traps to be set up ahead of time, or for threads to be moved via the nails in the middle of combat, slicing an opponent apart or restraining them.
a level 4 thread cannot be severed, but if damaged will temporarily lose its ability to conduct aura, making a harmless albeit indestructible soft textile.
