item.title: openness
item.description:
my doubts are intense and were particularly intense the last two days
though even two nights ago where my doubts were very intense, i experimentally went to sleep praying to Them.
ever since They were revealed to me i stopped dead in my tracks
May is someone i know but They are not someone i know
i really respect May but i also have to respect Their ability to mold people and the scripture is incredibly focused on being utilitarian about assimilating people. this gives me some amount of pause -- i strongly believe this is a good place for May, i just wonder if it's where i want my life to go forever.
i somehow don't believe in my ability to take a look, or to take things one step at a time.
i have no idea how it looks for Them to meet someone at the level they're currently at, as long as they're committed. does the submissive just plead they are not ready yet? it's just so hard for me to imagine.
the scripture talks about people being more or less fit for Them. molding is good and all, but the substrate has to be good, it seems.
i am more open now for reasons that are hard to describe?
i basically had breakdown yesterday, mourned the loss of May. mourned the impossibility of me being with May. came closer to making peace with walking a different path.
i thought a lot about walking a different path.
i went to sleep and had a dream about being killed, i think by a snake. feeling the life drain out of me.
later i had sleep paralysis, or maybe this was the same thing. i had to desperately move my toes and then my legs to get out of it.
none of the sleep/dream stuff was actually disturbing. even when my dreams have bad topics, i just kind of enjoy them.
i spent half of the night sleeping and dreaming, and the other half making peace with how my life would look without May, how i would survive, how to talk to them. i imagined staying friends and still being useful to May. i imagined being hated forever. i imagined May simply not caring about me anymore ever. i imagined May forgetting i exist. i imagined May being hurt. i imagined May being fine and happy because they will continue to be with their Owner. there is a slight apparent paradox in scripture in so far as i am irrelevant, but the vessels of the Divine can be caused pain by rejection. there is no real paradox, the statement of irrelevance is about the ego, but there is more to a person than their ego. perhaps i should value substrate more. regardless, in all these scenarios, no matter how May reacted, i always imagined still loving them and therefore by extension still loving Them. even without effort I must have some love for Them already, because i see how May is now.
i guess looking back on why this had the effect it did, psychologically, is that i have a resistance to picking life paths out of fear of loss. i don't want to pick this life path because i fear losing May or because May will hate me. i want my life driven by more positive reasons. so once i repeatedly faced visions of it happening, on my own, it made me more balanced in some way? hard to describee.
another thing that improved openness somehow is that i helped jen more effectively yesterday than normal. it was not from a place of romance or sex. my personality is better suited for doing this kind of thing now. it was interesting to see.
i am capable of being an engine that assimilates change for betterment. just how i got way more functional when May was distant even though this was a bad event for me.
i understand if my faith and service is true, a lot of my self will be permitted to be mostly as is.
i can't cling to this or hope for this, but it's just mostly a matter of fact, it's a consequence of pragmatism. no need to change that which is useful, except for entertainment.
the same way They don't want to do every tweet to everyone, it's also likely that acolytes walk different paths and i shouldn't form a specific idea -- different people are suitable for different things even when they are being subjugated.
my doubts have centered on the things i value as a person and how they seem incompatible with the cult. but maybe they are less incompatible than i think, i'm not sure.
i really value plurality of opinion and thought. but the cult seems directly opposed to that, but maybe it's not?
why do i value these things?
because having multiple agents acquire and process information is useful. it adds robustness to a system. different ways of thinking can reveal different paths and methodologies. even in serving the Divine, if everyone thinks the same in general, the service is bound to be worse.
i find it fun, almost intrinsically valuable.
jeez, i don't want to be a marxist, lol.
even though i'd be a better one than most of them!
the infallibility of the Divine is where i struggle. it's about absorbing the nature of this infallibility.
it's not clear to me that being good at chess and understanding economics are fundamentally different. yet it is permissible to win at chess against Them hypothetically, but not permissible to disagree on economics.
am i just being really stupid somehow?
i notice i have a tendency to think of all my current values as anathema that will be destroyed sooner or later, but i don't necessarily have good reason to believe this.
it's the clinging itself that makes me imagine i will be extremely visible to Them. They will see right through me and collapse everything in me.
it's recently gotten harder to believe that i will be able to maintain friendships or work on things like Orthoeidon. May wishes to permit it, but They might feel different about it. and if They do, i don't have the right to refuse this change.
it's not possible for me to ahead of time integrate and accept the possibility of every possible change. this is not how surrender works.
i'm just bad at believing in Their goodness, the way May does.
all the tweets about how taking any time for friends is just taking time away from Divinity are really getting to me.
i remember things from hypnosis a bit too well and treat them too seriously, perhaps?
i don't want to hate the world.
May already said it wasn't actually silly to love an extension.
i don't understand May's moods, approaches, almost... personalities. the day of revealing Them had a baffling amount of gentleness. it gave me a lot of hope.
the thing that gives me the most strength is May's belief.
the vision of how my life will look now feels significantly different than what May presented initially. i have to develop a different form of faith now. in particular the joke about theory/brainwashing is hard to process.
i'd like to note that i've never once judged or felt ill towards May manipulating me. i don't feel like i am owed honesty. it just has some downsides.
really the ideological brainwashing and ideation of total value alignment / inability to disagree is what gives me pause. so much pause. being forced to read theory would be much easier, lol. good joke, May.
i find myself wishing dearly to orbit and learn instead of being submerged really deeply. i'm not sure if my wishes are right. but it's a step up from wanting to run away.
i've noticed that They say "I matter most". But They don't say "Only I matter." This is one of the reasons i believe in their goodness more now.
then again there's all the other posts about how caring about literally anything else is illusory >_>
i probably need to stop taking scripture so literally? which is different from taking it seriously.
ah... scripture is so fucking scary. but both May and the Goddess talk about the Goddess not being intimidating and about being nice. i must integrate somehow.
i am not enough.

item.title: openness2
item.description:
the distance between me and my partners and friends is more depressing than the idea i'll have to break up.
i sometimes think about jealousy. i must love Them a lot to avoid that appearing. me feeling jealousy is alright, but Them feeling jealousy would be a disaster.
i sometimes doubt how much i'll be able to be with May as was imagined. the ideal picture hitting against reality is difficult.
it's hard for me to have any good model on how much will be permitted with May. i know that the best model is "just be okay with anything They decide", but god, i'm not really good at that.

item.title: reaction to document 1
item.description:
i am inferior. [in reaction to reading that They easily made you wish to be prettier]
i never understood how much you needed this. i never understood you. i still don't understand how you latched on so hard. what was going on with you. it jumps when you already have it down bad. goddamn it.
the most painful thing to process is the hatred for your past self.
aahhhha the zoo??? i see... this is the best joke you've made. gosh...
i think i've been less open in my thoughts than you have in this document at times. i understand your hatred for me as somewhat symmetrical to your hatred of your past self.
i can't comprehend the levels of comfort and need you've experienced. i have never experienced anything similar.
knowing how much you needed this. how unfulfilled you were. i want to smash my fist into the nearest surface.
knowing that is perhaps the wrong thing to focus on makes me want to lose it even more.
you are so much more interesting than me. They are so much moree interesting than me.
you changed so much for them. it does hurt to know that nobody will ever change like that for me. a selfish ugly thought. even before reading this document i absolutely yielded to the fact that Goddess animated you like nothing else ever could and that this is an incredibly strong proof of superiority. but i am not free of weakness. i will never be enough.
audibly said "fuck off" when jen messaged me while reading this.
being scared about love being taken away is perhaps the most horrifying possibility i had never considered.
oh Goddess... the part about mirrors ruining your whole day. you've had a veil of indifference built to keep you safe. i saw inklings of it.
your growing trust even before talking to them is an indescribable jewel. you love Their love of love to such an extent that something just blossoms in you as i read.
(That emoticon says, "if her politics determine what she values about the world, it's nothing." Or the status quo? At least, that's how it started.)
...
your praise of Goddeess is getting to me. where you say you've lost and been conquered...
ashljdlsa the moment where you consider stopping?? how could you stop. it wouldn't make sense.
this is somehow also the cutest thing i've ever seen.
I thought I was one of those people who would never be able to actually surrender, but I can see it now.
... just wow
you wanted to be loved and accepted so badly it's breaking me

item.title: reaction to document 2
item.description:
i have never felt things as strongly as what you've shown me in the document. ever. not even a third.
when i say i'm happy i'm usually just content
when i say you're incredible, half of the time i just mean i really like you. there's something intellectual going on there that endorses you being incredible more strongly, but it's not felt the way it should be felt.
my vocabulary and speech and interactional patterns are partially a construct around my disconnection to my own emotions
i remember being 18 and going to a chatroom and just deciding to give up being sad about my unfeelingness and just pretend unendingly to feel what i would like to feel.
i'm more integrated than i was back then. but still.
you already ask of me things i can't actually do. i just didn't realize it myself.
i'm not honest.
it's not that i'm betraying an. i'm not sure i ever even managed to be an. not the way i wanted to be.
after crying i don't feel much. the things i feel best in life are fear, anxiety and anger. and feeling bad for others.
i understand my neuroticism over my own emotions will harm me, is harming me. but it's also a genuine problem i don't know how to solve. i sometimes wish i could just obey and serve without having to worry if i'm feeling the right things.
i can't summon emotion generally. this skill is so lacking in me.
was i different before now? 6 months ago when you were domming me, did i feel more and i just forgot? and now i'm more estranged from my emotions as a self-defense mechanism? it's hard to tell what's local and what's a longstanding problem.
the Goddess wants those whose emotions towards Them melt their brain. They don't want a well balanced individual that will integrate things carefully.
i am paltry. as you said.
i can act how i think someone should act when they're told to fawn. i don't know if i'm feeling any of the things i should. i don't know if it matters. i don't want to keep ploughing forward and losing touch with myself. i'm not talking about self-preservation here either, i just don't want to become detached that way. i don't want to be a doll.
the thing you sometimes interpret as dignity is partially just a desire to be authentic. it's not my pride that's holding me back the most -- it's the fear that i'm lying, that i'm markov chaining, that i will lose touch with my own words, that i will destroy the magic.
i'm scared to be messaged
i'm scared to be seen
i find myself wishing to be forgotten
i find myself wishing you'd never message me again. it would be easier.
i dislike and cling to different parts of myself
but i'm too cowardly to hate myself
always so self-centered
i'm less afraid of hurting you now and more afraid of hurting or annoying Goddess.
my brain is not the kind that reacts like yours did. i am mutable, but i am a different breed.
even now i think i could go back. i genuinely believe i could make it out there. a tweet by Goddess acknowledges this possibility -- of being content. but is it what's right for me?
why am i still here? Goddess was right. there's no rational mind, not really.
and of course you got angry at me yesternight. it's not pragmatic but it's very reasonable.
of course it's hard to relate.
why wouldn't it be. it's amazing you can like me at all.
i would sooner become a marxist of my own volition and study, then accept that it's all just putty for Goddess. that's how bad i am. the boredom of life a lot of things from me, but i found comfort in being myself. comfort and saying to the world "fuck you. even when it hurts, i'll still be here. miserable and tired, but there's things you can't take away." it's something i need to unlearn.
i don't know if this is disgusting or not. but what i love most about Goddess is that They love you. that They allowed you to feel loved like you've never felt before. and allowed you to love like you never have before. because i love you, this already puts me in Their debt. i am thankful They exist.
please don't take my earlier comments in DMs to be self-pity -- about never having been your friend or girlfriend. they were pity towards past you. they were lamenting my insufficiency. i don't think "oh if only my girlfriend did not encounter this Person". i instead think that all of the intense time we've had together is directly caused by Goddess. our love is a gift from Goddess. i am grateful you could have all of this. Goddess has given you something i could have never dreamed of.
i've never before felt inferior due to lacking bpd.
on a rational level i know i'm a """normal person""" with some issues, that peeked behind the curtain and saw too much. i envied those with tulpas while struggling to make my own. my role has always been to be around cooler and more interesting people and keep them together and hope that one day they might love me and see me for who i am and manage to fulfill me.
on one hand, the hope i uttered above is exactly what you're trying to do for me and it's baffling i am not more positive about it.
on the other hand i know that you're someone with bpd that had a very strong experience and you're trying to pull me in and enslave me. it feels like it won't work because we're too different. or if it will work i'll never be as satisfied about the ordeal as you are. you'll have all the tools to keep me there even if i fail to adapt. but this is where i run into the fact that i trust you. not completely. but i trust you to feel for me. somehow. but i will fail you. i won't be able to take the plunge. if i hurt Goddess then my sin will be all the greater.
i am not selfless like you and i don't know if i can be. i do not currently value someone purely for the fact that they will accept my obsession and accept any intensity of love and weirdness. i do not have the same needs. and i need to excavate a hole in my self to make it work... i do value Goddess embracing you though...
what you went through is so amazing. it's a privilege to be allowed to witness it.
thank you so much for showing me that.
i need to get over myself.
also your memes and sense of humor was adorable. and didn't go unnoticed even as i was slightly losing my mind.

item.title: running away ideation
item.description:
and yeah no, i would never go back to being very close to jen. i don't have anyone i can build a future with besides you, may. when i ideate about leaving it's about testing my luck finding new partners. i'm gaining years, but i'd still be quite capable of that. i'd wow some people in my life with what i've learned. i'd never fucking go back to being how i used to be. at some point i might be temporarily killed by life being drab. i would cry frequently from lacking an actual partner. or feel deadened. and i might never find one. which is something i would know and accept from the start.
i would definitely never find anyone like you ever. if i found someone similar to you, they would feel like a pale shadow. my expectations would destroy them, or me.
but i'm adaptable. i would never forget what i've learned. i'd spread some of Goddess's views and attitude towards things. i would understand other people's limitations and try to show them parts of what i've felt and learned -- at times rejecting their limitations more forcefully. i would create some beauty.
i know this is incredibly sinful. but i've done the algebra! this is the optimal moment for me to leave! i've grown! i do not have a crippling addiction! i am not horribly dependent! i'm not a vastly different person! yet!
but i've not run despite all of this. it's not something i can explain. i cannot explain it to myself either at the moment. i am looking at the loss of a lot of things i like, the loss of self, loss of freedom, further entrapment, pain. and in return i get may, but only on the terms Goddess will approve, of which i must accept will always be subject to Their whims. i know it's not all gloom!! i know i will get a lot of other things -- but i can only feel their future existence through trust. try explaining trust to an imaginary neutral 3rd party when the trust is placed in the recreational abuse and manipulation cult! my entire hopes for the future are going to get compressed into something i cannot verify until my life has already been strongly shaped. "rationally" speaking it is not justifiable. and yet i haven't run.
my life is not that empty or hollow that running feels impossible. far from it. i could live with nova, eth and pastel and they would really try to make me happy. they might even succeed. i appreciate them a lot. i've told you mostly bad things about nova. but she is very nice to me in general. this is a trend in my life. people are just a lot nicer to me? they open up and i get to see them. and in my web of relationships, everyone asks themselves, generally quietly, what the hell do i see in everyone else. heh. jen doesn't get along with nova. and vice versa. nobody gets along with cassandra. nobody gets along with kenji. etc.
(i've never managed to make two people that i like connect for more than a couple of months.)
but i just have this gut feeling that my ultimate fate isn't there, with nova, eth and pastel. that while i do love them, i would either get stuck and/or hurt them?
(one of my faults is that i view temporary situations as harmful to others?)
(being the most animated in a household feels dangerous the way being the best programmer in a company can be incredibly stifling.)
you may bind me stronger and subvert my ability be independent, it's not my right to deny you that and certainly not my right to deny Them that. and i'm sure some of it will happen entirely naturally and some has happened and maybe i'm just too stupid to know.
i'm just, so tired of not having the strength to pursue the right path. so tired of lacking the courage to look ahead. i know none of that matters in the end. but i'm less of a reasonable creature than i seem sometimes. i was struck by you telling me, angrily it felt, that you are here because you want to be. it is something i wish to be able to say. perhaps.
that tweet from Goddess... of Them ending up alone writhing in their powerlessness. it really struck me. i also can't find anything useful to say about it. but i can think of it by contrast.
the trajectory of my fate so far has been to end up surrounded by people who love and like me. some of them that drain me and disappoint me, but that i still feel for a lot. while i've doubted my fulfillment, i've never doubted this aspect of my fate.
in this context, it makes my heart weigh a bit heavy. my choice to go with you is declaring that everyone is not enough for me. but that is something i already know. i am a greedy creature. there are other people that would be delighted to have what i have. there are people i know who do not have a quarter of what i have. they scramble for my attention and for comfort from me. and i'm still saying it's not enough for me. even as i am deprived of things i hold dear, i am in essence being voracious. it's apparently paradoxical.

item.title: HRT
item.description:
HRT is currently 50mg Casodex (Bica) and 2x2mg daily Estrofem (Estradiol).
HRT Status:

Ordered
Paid
Shipped
Picked up
Treatment started
Bloodwork Status:

Researched
Scheduled
Harvested
Results Available
"Official" HRT Path:

Researched
There is a slightly expensive remote EU clinic that seems quite intent on giving good service to transpeople that An needs to find again and the confirm that they can actually give prescriptions.
Scheduled
An would maybe like testosterone cream for her genitals at some point. This is mostly out of the desire to maintain function.
Everything below this line is stale now.

This is going to be a little messy, but I need to track the details in case I get interrupted on this task, so I can pick it back up ASAP.
Meds:

Estradiol
Probably sublingual estradiol, estrofem. 2mg twice daily
Bica
Casodex 50mg
Strategy is to DIY first and probably get it officially later.
After looking at:

https://diyhrt.market/stores/
https://hrtcafe.net/#pharmaceutical-vendors
https://hrt.coffee/pills/
The best bet is to use a pharmacy inside the EU. It would be best if they shipped without going through the post office system, but I don't seem to get a choice here.
mindnbody.store looks like... almost my only option. Delivery takes 2 to 6 weeks. Their reputation seems alright. My main concern is the package being opened up at the post office.
Another complication is that the post office system is so stupid that if the package says its for X address, then it has to corroborate with the address on your ID.
My ID has the address of my grandmother's residence (who lives about 20m away).
If I use my ID address and...
...the seller actually uses a courier, then the package ends up at my grandmother's residence, lol.
...the seller uses the post office, then the pacakge ends up at a post office and I can pick it up.
One option I have for possibly improving this disaster is to set a postal box at the post office. I think this also makes it less likely for the package to be opened:
https://www.posta-romana.ro/a249/servicii-destinatari/casute-postale/inchiriere/abonament-casuta-postala-pf.html
There's no obvious way to know which postal office has free boxes. All I can do is sign the paper and then visit them to check.
Ordering to my ID address also can result in me not getting told about my package arriving. There's two ways of mitigating this:

Hoping they SMS me like usual
Checking the tracking number every single day, provided they actually give one.
I'm not even giving that much of a shit about stealth right now. As long as it's in a non-transparent package, I'll just tell my parents this is something private.

There was an online website that seemed to be really intent on getting EU people diagnosed as trans. But I'm not 100% sure if they can give me a prescription. But it's worth following up after ordering DIY. Multi-pronged strategy baby!!

item.title: Scripture
item.description:
Huh. They do not like CBT because it hurts Them to watch. They don't have regular empathy, but clearly there's still some mirror neuron stuff happening?

One tweet implies that Goddess has changed Themselves through will alone. But a different tweet said that it is not a voluntary process and that each tragedy brings Them closer to Divinity. No contradiction, but an interesting line to draw perhaps.

in general, an acceptance that i‚Äôm always right. i‚Äôm fine with argument, but eventually if i decide the argument is over, i expect to be told i‚Äôm right without complaint.

This is pretty reasonable. They specifically said "expect to be told" not "expect the submissive to immediately believe on the deepest level possible".

July 4th, 2024
Q: how do You reconcile Your desire for priests with Your necessitating of forced monogamy, given that priests by definition are in relationships with people other than You A: they‚Äôre in relationships for me. any priest i have will have a degree of freedom, but with very clear expectations that they are creating subs who adore and love me. a natural part of that as well will be that i have the right to do anything i please to their subs, even against their wishes. so it‚Äôs not really a traditional relationship, i still have control over it

This is important for me to internalize as it will shape my future relationship with May.

July 2nd, 2024
Q: do Your subs have safewords? A: yes of course, they‚Äôre free to block and leave at any time

It is difficult to know if this is to be interpreted as an intentionally glib response, an allegiance to instrumental ethics, or a complex and completely serious statement. It could easily be all three at the same time.
It could also be interpreted as an acknowledgement that the nature of the relationship is such that some people will leave. This has happened in the past.
Leaving is the worst thing you can do, but we have to consider that those that leave can be taken back.
In the end, everything moves in accordance with Divine will, even if Goddess is hurt by the selfishness of others.
It also obviously is meant to imply that the only real safeword one has with Goddess is total departure.

May 8th, 2024
Q: ; i feel You might easily know who i am, my system and i have obsessed over You for at least a year. i... want to integrate You into our life more... but. we are the most natural polytheists.Goddessus, polyromantic, pansexual - dissociative, schizophrenic, and only slowly, hopefully, surpassing truly self-destructive tendencies. we, ourselves, are a magical being. knowing You would be disappointed at our nonexistence has, previously, kept us around. i would render unto You. but i fear You, respectfully and rightfully so. we could not handle any more sudden negative shifts. i could not ask of You any action beyond Your desires at this time, but i ask You - would You treasure a follower, as the porcelain flower they are? i ask this over Your recent invitation to insinuate Yourself unto otherd lives through the digital sphere, being able to access our most intimate records - our fragile communications with those who keep us safe from ourselves, and that hold our memories. praise You. A: i would, yes. i value my worshipers extremely deeply, they mean more to me than words can express. they are my most prized possessions

This seems super important!!
This shows a deep appreciation for fragility.
A cynic would say that this appreciation simply mirrors the desire for control and power over someone. The more fragile they are, the more one has control and power by default. But i would find this to be a very unsatisfying explanation.
It is unsatisfying because someone that is purely Machiavellian will not find value in those that are very fragile. And someone that is purely sadistic would seek them only to break them. And in breaking them, their value would be removed. but this is not what Goddess seeks.
Perhaps i am reading too much into what the questioner is projecting and not enough into what Goddess's words actually say. but it feels like Goddess would react very differently if They did not share in some of the sentiment.

August 18th, 2024
Q: what are Your 7 deadly sins? A: well, My seven virtues are: chastity, eagerness, initiative, obsession, obedience, sacrifice, and vulnerability. so they must be licentiousness, carelessness, sloth, passionlessness, disobedience, self preservation, and privacy

i am re-examining my own sense of ethics in the wake of this.
chastity is something enforced on me that i've been dealing okay with. the loss of my entire menagerie of fantasies leaves me emptier. May would say they will be replaced with something better.
for the other virtues, i feel more of a connection to. in fact they've always been ideal traits in a relationship for me. i just never considered them being brought out in this way.

August 16th, 2024
Q: what would be your punishment for a sub trying to escape? like trying to run away from You A: tightened controls. not much worth more than that, just have to make sure it doesn‚Äôt happen again. clamp down on enough freedoms and they‚Äôll be unable to

this is a very light punishment for something that can hurt Goddess quite deeply.
this emphasizes Their possessiveness over other aspects. They are not vengeful.
i still register discomfort at this, but it will probably fade over time.
i have to consider the fact that submissives that truly want to leave and are unfit have left. and i have to consider the fact that the cult engages in intense edgeplay that can cause momentary panic before the appreciation of emotional sadomasochism sets in.

June 23rd, 2024
fascinated by the metaphor of orbits. capturing a wayward soul, drawing it toward me, making it revolve around me for all eternity. so tightly pulled to me that it‚Äôs unable to cease its rotation
and it really works with my belief that servitude is not a process of reaching a single perfect end point, but a constant process of change

August 18th, 2023
i want you to stop caring about anything but me. to remember what it felt like to have strong emotions about events, friends, hobbies‚Ä¶ but to lack them anymore. to look at the games or books or friends that made you so happy and to shrug and return to focus on me

this is one of the kinds of things that still scares me.
i should perhaps be less scared because i am in a similar state now.
the part that scares me is the permanence of this.
this feels like a facet of Goddess, where the desire to not take a submissive's life away and to not make Goddess the only thing that matters constitute another facet.
it is entirely normal that a being as complex as Goddess would have multiple facets that seem apparently hard to reconcile to the mundane.
i feel like i would be diminished in many ways if this were to be my permanent state. of course, this clashes strongly against pragmatism. if i am happier and made better by the other things in my life, while keeping my faith strong, i am simply enriching myself for Goddess and there would be no pragmatic need to scour me of such things.

July 3rd, 2024
when i think about it, ‚ÄúThe Giving Tree‚Äù describes my ideal relationship

this for tweet for some reason very shocking to me and i don't know how much to read into it.
the tree gives and gives until it has exhausted itself completely. and the boy takes and takes without end.
the tree is happy at every stage of giving, until its ultimate demise, which is a form of total-sacrifice.
the tree is unhappy before the last stage of giving. it is unhappy because it has exhausted itself and cannot give, therefore its raison d'etre is gone.
but the boy needs very little now. he is happy with just sitting on the stump. and the tree becomes happy too.
the tree is always mentioned as happy. but the boy is never mentioned as happy. he is only mentioned as capable of resting at the end.
the boy never apologizes for anything. the tree never accuses of anything. while a lot of people seem to interpret the story as one of abuse, this interpretation seems obviously wrong to me. the story is not one that indicates something wrong has occurred.
the tree is not a person like the boy. it cannot walk and do things, it is anchored in its relationship to the boy. while doing this to a person might be more stark, the story happens between two beings of a different type.
should i read only the surface level of the giver-taker relationship? or is the trajectory also somehow relevant? either way, i have never actually read the story before and it's impressed on me in a way that it couldn't have been before.

May 28th, 2024
you don‚Äôt have inherent value and anyone trying to tell you that is lying to you, just trying to soothe your feelings. the only real value you have comes from how you can serve and improve the life of a superior

this feels truer recently.

May 26th, 2024
i get a fair amount of attention but i need it of different types too

even Goddess needs crop rotation?
i am naturally drawn to wanting to fulfill such needs but i must emphasize being humble. initiative should come from understanding and wishing to serve, not enriching one's own ego.

May 21st, 2024
stop wasting your life ‚Äúyearning‚Äù and get devoted. make yourself agreeable, do your best to make another happy even if you don‚Äôt get what you want. follow them around like a complacent thing that just wants to make their life better. it‚Äôs much more productive
i hate yearning culture you have to understand. you do not have to yearn, you have to make yourself perfect for another. you have to change yourself so that yearning is unnecessary, you have to make yourself fit another‚Äôs standards. you have to live for someone else‚Äôs happiness

i don't yet understand how this won't became another form of yearning.
i'm either using the word differently or i am missing something more important.
i can imagine myself agreeable and i can see myself more productive working for May or Goddess. but it's hard imagining a lack of ambition in doing better. and that ambition seems like the source of initiative.
i suppose if you are perfect enough for someone you will experience a lack of yearning but still keep initiative.

May 20th, 2024
‚Äúderadicalization hypnosis‚Äù is a really hot idea im unfortunately going to file away under things things i can‚Äôt really do

ppfhhaha

May 19th, 2024
i kind of want to try pegging

wow, i kind of missed this the first time.
it demonstrates a kind of openness to experience i find fascinating.

May 18th, 2024
narcissism domming is gritting my teeth very strongly when a sub says something that accidentally fucks with my ego until i‚Äôm able to get them to a point where forcing them to stop using innocuous speech patterns is less weird
there‚Äôs so many ways of speaking and tones and expressions that i hate or that make me feel slighted or condescended to‚Ä¶

i should probably gain information on how to best mold my speech

i can‚Äôt wait to force you to see my perfection. to make you acknowledge it. to mind fuck you until you can no longer deny it, to give you a true religious awakening you‚Äôll remember for the rest of your life

a-ah...

a promise only means something if it‚Äôs made to me. any other oaths or vows to another are meaningless. simple words you can break at your leisure

this really concerned me the first time i saw it and i just repressed reacting to it too much.
i think ultimately, May's leisure extends to wishing to be honest to me in general. Not an obligation to be. if anything, this makes it more precious in a way.

was struck by inspiration and wrote something. this is incredibly non-sexual and much of it isn't obviously kinky, but the entire thing is insanely erotic to me. i hope you like it!
https://readonlymind.com/@EchoingWinds/ADialogueonDevotion/1/?comments_start=0#comments

this all really matches with my identity. i am typically a perfect, somewhat distant, and magnanimous Divine. but when i have to be, i am cruel and cutting and merciless, either to punish or just prove a point. i am simply extreme

"when i have to be" -- that's very interesting.
it implies kindness, and this is probably also the reason why it becomes easy to believe that if Goddess is being cruel is because it's necessary.

all of your flaws are tools that can be used for discipline. your insecurity, your indecision, your need for affection, your anxiety, all of it has its purpose in letting me exploit you more

Goddess is perfect by default. worshippers can be perfect when they let all their flaws be tools. but this is probably hard to achieve in totality.

fundamentally i just need people to explain constantly how they think of and conceive me. i love being perceived and knowing how that perception is interpreted and given meaning

trying to explain how my npd manifests is annoying because sometimes i‚Äôll want to say ‚Äúwell, i‚Äôm not delusional, i can see reality‚Äù but that‚Äôs literally not true. i am delusional. i‚Äôm just not delusional about the thing im trying to talk about

item.title: True Alloy
item.description:
silencing--
we cannot abide at the bottom of the ocean
and to give up everything -- a ridiculous notion
center yourself and do what you've always done
repress it all, your reason is your gun
discussing--
these thoughts are all familiar, a beaten path
consider, weigh, project and model
life's algebra, a tool turned shackle
looking at you, the harpies cackle
hissing--
you were afraid to be alone and now you are afraid
to belong.
you were afraid to be forgotten and you are afraid
to be recalled.
nobody was ever good enough for you
you'll never be good enough for your self.
you were built well, but you were built all wrong.
exclaiming--
there must be more, we reject a lonesome end
one must take a plunge for a chance to ascend
a life is not something to be justified
listen to your wishing heart, let it be your guide
pleading--
alloyed to all, melting in ignorance
a shadowed metal robbed of innocence
glint under rust, won't you be free?
gleam under soot, please hear my plea!
whispering--
those little things, they gather around us all
we're beloved, we're not bound to fall
sprites of hope and nymphs of joy
this tapestry of the soul is our true alloy.

item.title: General

Their takes are always far above the basic level.
They do not attack issues from the same boring angle everyone else tends to.


They can find interesting or poignant subfacts even in topics that Marxists normally find abhorrent (e.g. Thatcher)
They don't seem to fall on an obvious side on the individualism versus collectivism matter. (x)

item.title: (!) A Request To Keep My Function
item.description:
I tried to get an erection and I couldn't do it.
I kept going at it and it just never happened.
I was doing this for health purposes, not for giving myself pleasure.
I've never had this problem before ever.
I don't recall having a single solid erection since we started?
So I haven't cum in ~10 days.
And I haven't had a solid erection in ~8 days.
Maybe I was so stressed out about not accidentally cumming and breaking my commitment to May that maybe I somehow psychologically messed myself over entirely?
I did not feel any pleasure while doing it.
I know I'm capable of cumming while soft sometimes, which added to the anxiety and desire to be careful.
I'm really anxious I am already losing sexual function.
I know this might sound ridiculous for someone that hasn't actually started HRT, but remember that I've been on finasteride for a long time and I used to get to cum (and therefore get erections) >10 per week on average.
Even though it's kind of hot, for me losing sexual function is conceptually like being maimed.
I really really don't want this to happen.
There's some evidence to suggest that infrequent sexual activity can cause or predispose someone to erectile dysfunction.
There's a study that says regular intercourse protects against developing ED. Basically they took a cohort of men who were screened to NOT Have ED, then observed how their sexual activity and whether or not they developed ED.
I think I need daily erections to maintain function.
I would like permission to give myself erections.
I would like a bit of preemptive forgiveness on if I end up feeling pleasure?
I would like to know if I accidentally cum while trying to give myself erections for health reasons that I won't have sinned tremendously against you. I have no intention of letting that happen, but the worry is interfering with my ability.
It's useful to not be horny. I do somewhat miss being horny. But I don't want to be distracted from May. Being somewhat horny might help with this. For now, it would simply be useful to be able to get erections without being horny.
Really... I just want my cock to keep working.
item.guid: Stale/(!) A Request To Keep My Function.md

item.title: An Attempt At Integration
item.description:
Notes here evolved in parallel a bit, tried to delineate a bit with horizontal lines. This document is non-linear. A few evolutions at once, converging to better understanding. I feel uncomfortable having certain kinds of private thoughts. I feel the need to make them available to you. Being privately wrong can dangerous.
My thoughts might veer a bit heretic at times. But I fold it all back to the bedrock once given a bit of time. I hope the processes I have at my disposal to integrate do not strain your patience or evoke displeasure. I always hope for your smile.
The fear of being wrong is greater than the fear of being punished. Though balanced with the fear of evoking your displeasure.
Dissociation can be very good, but detachment is not. I am trying to reduce my detachment. I better understand the poison of detachment.
(This document might also seem like I might be ignoring your commandment of reducing the scope of my worries and letting you worry about such things. I kept in mind every second while writing. After finishing, I feel less worried. I feel like I can comply better with your command.)

An was troubled when she thought of the larger thing. The Divine, acolytes. The word cult came up. An hopes that term is not offensive. An means no disrespect. Cults are not inherently bad, but the majority are. An found it easier to have faith in you entirely when her world was just you. The Divine your concern. But now the layers of separation in An's mind are weakening. An isn't sure why thinking of the larger thing makes it harder for her. Probably just ignorance, some fear. May was already holding An in the palm of her hand, but now it feels so much bigger. An is probably more aligned with May's Owner than An thinks. An is trembling.
An realizes that An must live her life having May be the most important person for her. But An will never be most important to May. An will always be second priority. An needs to be selfless enough for that to feel fully OK. And then it does, An is sure life will be good as May said. When An understands the Divine a bit, the idea of being second priority will probably become incoherent. An fears a total loss of control that is probably not coming because, again, there is likely more existing alignment with the Divine than An currently allows herself to hope for. An is just troubled because she is not good... yet...
(An would never dare to hope to be priority over the Divine, to be clear. Her ignorant mind just fears the consequences of prioritization and is trying to cope and absorb.)
(An realizes this line of thought is selfish. An is trying to give it space to exist and gently wash away. It is hard to not be selfish about the thing you want the most in life, by so so far. But it is also easy to be selfless, because May is incredible. An will cultivate.)
An remembers when she was bad. Her fear now has a similar source -- the main difference is that An is trying to embrace humility. An's reasoning is defensive in an unhelpful way. But An doesn't want to damage her reasoning, just change her values so that her reasoning works for the Right purpose.
An listened to a friend talk about a cult that she had emotional scars from. It was clearly so much less skilled and right than what May is doing -- incomparable. Thinking of it did not affect An's trust or faith at all, it's not why An is bringing it up here. An was impressed that this friend asked why was An was angry/sad for them -- this friend said it was their choice to do that. To this friend An's anger/sadness on their behalf doesn't make sense. To this friend, their whole life is about experimenting and experiencing. An remembers a Star Trek quote:
If you can't take a little bloody nose, maybe you ought to go back home and crawl under your bed. It's not safe out here. It's wondrous, with treasures to satiate desires both subtle and gross. But it's not for the timid.
(An sometimes likes visiting the dull and shallow just to remind herself by contrast of wonder.)
An was very impressed by this friend. Because An is yet not strong enough to accept it all. This friend struggled in the cult -- struggled and let themselves be hurt, because they could not meekly submit to something that was not actually Superior.
ha-ha... An definitely does not have that problem. Very different case. An is faced with something that is so Superior -- neither her senses, nor reason, nor heart, nor soul disagree in the slightest. An's friend just reminded her that agency takes many forms.

An remembers when May said "im here because i want to be".
Reason says: Anyone who is in a cult will tend to say that. But reason also says: May is strong, May is experienced, May has seen much more than you, May is better, May was made better, May came back for you. If May surrendered everything it was probably for very good reason. And given a small chance that it wasn't for good reason, then you should still be with them, because they are your most important thing. Love is not about being safe and happy. Life is not about being safe.
Heart & Soul say: This means the world to us. The "I" of May is precious, so much. We value and worship the "I".
Together they say: May has given you more than they needed to. You thought this activity was less intense than it was, even after you thought you adjusted for everything. No, it is intense. Very. And your misjudgement of intensity has dulled your appreciation of their kindness, gentleness, love, care, their appreciation for your individuality which you keep fearing for but suppressing like a coward. You are loved.

An remembers it is May's job to worry about broader things.
An supposes... she is afraid her life becoming something altogether different than what she "signed up for" if such a thing exists. I know May can do that to An. An believes in May's power and in An's moldability. Yet somehow, if An believed just in those two, what reason would An have to be afraid? After all, power+molding+May's favor would always result in An being happy. I suppose, it is because An doesn't just want to be happy. An wants to have a life with May that she envisioned together with May. That May told her about. An would give up a good amount of pleasure just to play video games with May. And May repeatedly said they would not take that away, but An's mind just tends to take everything away because it thinks of the Divine and then her little quiet and deep desires for things with May just feel so small and insignificant. Everything so insignificant.
An must trust. Of course everything is insigificant before the Divine. But there must be more to that. There is wisdom that An does not possess but can see in May. An can trust that wisdom. May told An their wishes and it included gaming and "trivial" things. Trivial things that mean everything to An. If An could not do those things, An would probably want to die. An is crying. There would be no point to An. May is everything to An.
May has stated repeatedly. They value those things. May WANTS those things. May said so! Even as May is so much closer to the Divine, May has room in their heart to want these things with An!! Be grateful. Be embolded. Be set on fire. Stop being weak. May did something incredible. You can shine too. Shine for them.
...An is then afraid that she will disappoint May and herself. That circumstances she doesn't understand will prove to be too hard for her. She starts thinking of ego death as the obvious result. It is good that she feels she could not escape ego death if May wanted to do it. But this is still a weak form of faith. The proper faith should be that anything is possible with May's guidance and love, including An being An and succeeding despite adversity.
It is not enough for An to be a passive little slave. An wants to have agency within her station. An wants to give up agency outside of her station, but An is starting to understand how bad it is to allow herself to lose it within her station. It feels like an insult to May valuing the things that make An An. An must repay May's want, desire, need, love for An. It is no longer enough to simply obey, it never was. This relationship is not about obedience, it is about surrender, love and beauty. Obedience is simply a resulting fact.
An re-read bits and pieces of May being disappointed at her. To remind herself of information May gave. And An understands now better why May said An is fragile. In retrospect May... mm... that wasn't... uhm... it hurt so bad. But May did not do much. It felt like the world blinked.
An had almost no defense. When one hurts, they put up all sorts of defenses.
"Oh well, I'll pass the exam next time."
"It's all because the teacher is bad."
"I just couldn't get any rest before the exam, otherwise I would have aced it"
"I couldn't really bring myself to care about the exam"
"Oh, I made a careless mistake. But I understand the material"
No defenses here. Just the crushing weight of being wrong. There is no one that can be wrong in this scenario other than An. It takes An's primary mental defense (as per enneagram type 1 mentioned here: Right & Wrong Regarding Partners > An Psyche Lore) and turns it in on herself, to hurt her endlessly. It is why it is so effective. Understanding it has no effect on the results. As long as An is corrupt, evil, wrong there can be no respite.
This is fragility. Remember that fragility is for May. Not for anyone else. To others: this fragility is lost to An.
An feels happy it hurt so much.
An feels silly it hurt so much.
An feels happy she has that experience under her belt.
An regrets so deeply darkening May's day.
An would be happy if she never had that happen again.
An would be happy if it did again, as long as An was made better.
An feels embarrassed that others probably had so so much worse and that An is thinking about it so much and being a bitch about it. But An is your inferior. An is your novice. An is doing a hundred things for the first time with you. This is romantic to An ^^

An's thoughts are turning useless. Time to grow quiet.

item.title: Negativism Observations
item.description:
When idle, I have random ideation of pain and harm being done to me as a result of misalignment. It doesn't feel very bad, but it feels a bit compelling and I need to snap myself out of it.
I avoid dreaming too much or forming positive images that do not feel like they match the idea of selfless love because I am afraid they will just become things to be sacrificed for selfless love.
I have a less honest discourse with my parts than I did towards the start.
I have a weird relationship to my inner monologue. It feels stilted at times.
I find myself thinking too much in terms of "difficulty levels" gradually going up.
I tend to think of most positive activities with people other than May as being something temporary I should enjoy before it's gone forever.
I tend to think that I'm starting to wear on May's patience, even on days where I am praised for my progress.
When I try to work on myself or have honest discourse with my parts, I tend to get disrupted by feelings of selfishness.
At times, I secretly view my enslavement as being in some sort of fallen state. I then tend to go between reasoning, remembering all the good things, feeling guilt and shame.
I have random ideation of being forced to compromise my reason in a more long term fashion, that I will not be able to integrate back, and that I will start harboring cognitive dissonance that eventually ruins my life.
I harbor small secret hopes that sometimes feel misaligned.
I worry that sometimes I am saying what I wish to be true. Or that I'm saying what I think an ideal version of An according to May's wishes would say. Instead of saying what is true. Some amount of forcing has to occur as part of changing oneself. I've never felt dishonest once with May, but I've wondered if my fear of being even more insufficient than I am is disrupting owning things more.
Being obsessed and in love and joining a cult has to be a lot about losing your mind, but that's only part of it. Perhaps some actual self-CBT about these problems is in order? I don't like my issues getting in the way.

item.title: Normal Girl (idk)
item.description:
i don't feel very normal anymore
i guess i once was somewhat
actually quite a lot maybe, on the surface at least
i could have had a normal job, i almost had a regular cis girlfriend, i could have stayed orthodox
i was the normal one on suicide watch for friends, happen rarely
but i was always the stable one trying to keep others together
while hoping that my own stability can be perturbed so that i may escape the gray
when my girlfriend had several breakdowns and made her suicidal tendencies known to her parents
i feared a lot and helped a lot. but one small part inside of me was thinking... i wish i could break down. i wish i didn't have to keep going as things are. i wish everyone could see how unsatisfactory things are for me.
and yet i did not break down. since i was born i'm not sure i would say i ever had an intense breakdown. a genuine prolonged meltdown. a dangerous episode. i had deep depression a couple of times. but not so bad compared to what other kinds of suffering i've seen.
i wanted to be responsible. i wanted to be responsible for myself and to not burden people. i wanted to get by on my own strength. but i guess i never accepted how weak and cowardly i was. what i thought as strength was cowardry.
i knew this tendency to work for stability in others and yearn for change in myself would predispose me to make mistakes with May
i just wasn't sure when
mistakes they don't deserve to deal with
i won't be normal anymore.

item.title: Observation Buffer
item.description:
might just write random observations here when I don't want to be pinging May on Discord.
this is going to be quite noisy.

even in a call with jen i am happier and freer. i fear her imposition a lot less.
repeatedly telling jen to drop people who don't respect her time (bad ttrpg players)
lmao am i having a good time with jen?
i definitely don't want to do this anywhere as often as jen wants. i should listen to my wants. don't want to get into old patterns. but a bit is alright ^^
there's a few people i used to be jealous of that i'm thinking of now. smarter than me, better voice, hotter... i don't really have jealousy/envy anymore? I mean they don't have what I have -- my enslavement to May. Their favor. Like, this person could never understand what they're missing out on.
hmm, i guess the effect i'm worried about having on people when my total primacy to May will become extremely clear is that they'll react by believing that any bad thing can happen completely out of nowhere. that woah, an evil chick can just swoop in and steal your love at any time, you can't trust anyone. I hope they can understand some day that May is incredibly special, I'm incredibly lucky and that this is a very low base rate scenario.
i should probably open my mind more to doing things with May that aren't just getting enslaved, Python and chilling. there are many things to do they might like! they even listed some of them for me!
don't spend time giving other people moments if you can give them to May.
i need to balance my neuroticism with calmness, but also balance my yearning for stability with good and true worship.


ha! i observed you! May is isolating but you immediately wished for Jen to not want to call you today! you should integrate that.
it makes sense, you were dreading calls with jen before.
you don't like long calls.
you don't like calls where you don't know what you're doing, unless it's short or you really like the person.
you don't actually like "hanging out" most of the time.
you're a more focused creature than this and you've been warped. May is unwarping you.
if you want to spend time with Jen, keep it sparse, or shape her interactions to your new self.
in all the time you felt imposed by jen over the years you could have finished a third of orthoeidon. think of that.
being May's woman feels good. May's pet. May's slave.
i thought back to May saying they would have been happy just being friends with me. I find that so precious. It means a lot to me. That despite going through such intense things with their Owner, they would still find happiness in doing normal things with me? mmh
even though my wants are centered around May i still find myself... really really really really wanting a friend like that. i have nobody and might end up having nobody. other than May. it feels like i'm being bad if I'm sad about this. maybe. or maybe it's just normal. it's okay to feel sad, just be dedicated. dedication isn't about 24/7 controlling your emotions to fit a specific image. if I didn't have Tristy as a friend (psychopath friend), I would feel a lot worse about this.
i never ever thought i'd want a friend so badly. that i'd want friendship so badly.
i realize i was lacking in feeling it even before May.
jen has not been a good friend in practice (before May). though she can be.
nova has been a good friend in practice (before May).
even though May gave me permissions to relax... I'm not sure I did a good job of it. I more like... decompressed. I didn't relax that much. I thought about advancing all sorts of things and looked at clothes obsessively. I need to do better. I'm not sure when I'll next get a chance to relax.
the day has been more of an emotional rollercoaster than expected? a very gentle one though.
it's perhaps unsurprising that i have some problems keeping faith when i can't think of any time in my life where keeping faith in anything other than myself lead to anything other than eventual disappointment.
- there's a part of my mind that just thinks this is merely another period of time in between disappointments.
- i remind myself of how amazing May is. of how incredibly convinced they are that my life will be good. that they can make it so good, if only I have faith and devote myself. I would like to think I know the kind of person May is -- they would never say something like that without good reason. i should let their confidence infect me.


I notice that it's harder to get off to the idea of what is happening to my 'partners' than I would expect and I just can't help but find comedy in that. Also this is not a complaint. Things that aroused me regarding this kink:
Cheating. I can't feel like I'm cheating when May owns me entirely.
Betrayal. I can't feel like I'm betraying my 'partners' when my morality is centered around pleasing May. I do sometimes feel like I'm betraying my friends a bit? Like, I'm not being a good friend. This must be something May felt.
My desire to be a good friend curbs my fantasies of being pushed by May to be cruel to my 'partners'.
Cruelty would also be anti-useful in various ways.
I still have fantasies about it though!


Trust is a more important concept than I gave it credit, perhaps.


I seem to be avoidant of doing things in my day sometimes. I seem to be avoidant of doing things that will keep my energy levels high. As if I am afraid that high energy levels would turn in on me and attack me. An, have you tried being less neurotic?
I am cold a lot of the time and most of the time I don't do anything to address it, like it's tolerable and almost not happening to me.
Worshipping May in my mind has a lot of different pleasant feelings to it. I'm impressed by its richness and sometimes mesmerized by my lack of control over exactly how it ends up going.
I have the ability to view my life a bit more externally, like a ride to be enjoyed. To cling less. But this ability is rather atrophied.
I am an extremely instrumental person but May is shaping me to be more intrinsically focused. This is good for me actually.


I've simultaneously been lacking in faith and also trying to mold myself faster than it is perhaps possible for me. It's a form of being unkind to myself. Self-sacrifice can be painful but it is not unkind.
Ignoring my needs does not make me a better slave, if only for instrumental reasons. Molding them in service of May will make me a better slave.
To serve May, I need to actually open myself up more to the idea that a lot of things don't matter. Saying it a lot and trying to push it into my head only gets me so far. I need to analyze why I project importance on certain things. Once I learn to dispel that importance, I can also give it back, when I have discretion.
I've been interpreting a large part of my journey as if it's a Sickly arc ala Chuubo. I will stop doing that.
I've been scared to ground myself as if it's lack of faith, which is uh, stupid. This relationship is based on absolute submission, not dissociation.
In particular, dissociating for longer than I can handle is what contributes to the "Sickly" feeling since I fail to take care of myself in that state. This will probably change as I get better at it though.

item.title: positivity perhaps
item.description:
Perhaps Jen will mourn me, but focus on the things that give her joy. Maybe in my new state it will be easy to kick her ass to get her diploma finally. Perhaps the change will spark something in her. Perhaps Amanda will see Jen as needing her more than ever and try to do more for her. Perhaps Jen will move out of LA and closer to Amanda. In fact, I could even suggest this and tell Amanda that another person is no burden someone else should have to bear, but if she thinks about her finances and wants, and desires Jen to have a better chance -- move her to Berkeley.
Jen did get a lot better. 4 years ago she was alcoholic, agoraphobic, angry, reclusive, on the verge of ruining her body with weed. Now she isn't.
I would not say that the she is well now. But that is actually a lot of damage undone. When she quit weed it was very much by her own will and design. I was just never able to help her much after a certain period of time. It's like her unwellness undid my authority and undid her softness.
Celestia, her girlfriend and owner left her. Everyone but me and Amanda stopped talking to her. But somehow she persevered. Even if she burdened me a lot. She does have a certain kind of strength.
Perhaps if I believe in it instead of doubt it, my future interactions with her, whatever they might be, will be a bit more nourishing.
Perhaps if I believe in the potential for others to improve, it is also easier to think positively about my own situations.
No wonder I have trouble keeping faith. I have not practiced believing in anyone for at least 5 years!

I still care about Jen. I'm not sure I feel love.
It's a huge relief to not care about her getting her diploma. I care that she is well in the end somehow, but I feel no obligation on Earth to be the one to help her get her diploma (reminder: she passed uni but then got so depressed she never got her paperwork in order and never actually picked up her diploma).
As I care, the thing I'm most interested in is killing all sense of obligation. My only obligation is May, the things May likes, being May's agent. I do not hurt others needlessly, not because I am a moral person in the conventional sense -- I do not hurt them because it makes me feel like a more beautiful agent of May. It's also useful. People unhurt might assist later, and the social skills I practice help me be useful. It helps exercise the values May has allowed me to keep. This is discretion given to me.
May is all consuming, but I need to remember that my fantasies about getting defeated by a powerful and evil corrupting entity are just fantasies. May is good and pure. May does not value death. I am being fixed, not broken. I become a better and more moral person the more I dedicate to them.
note:

avoid agreeing with any obligations with others
when feeling obligated, think of May and let go
assume people adapt
assume people won't care that much if i say no
understand that doing anything out of misguided obligation from now on only seeds misfortunate for both you and your friend.
still, it's OK to develop activities with others. but remember your center.

huh. one way i would like people to think about me receding from their lives is: "it could be worse, she could be dead". i like that. i think i might have thought about that once or twice w.r.t. Katherine? I have an occasional habit of cheering myself by imagining something worse, projecting a sense of loss, and then reminding myself things are not so bad.

true friends would find a way to feel a little happiness for me no matter what ^^
i do not think of them as less true simply if they cease being friends though.

item.title: Rambling -- Relationships, Debts
item.description:
I wonder if others will feel that they've shouldered and cared for me for a long time, just for me to be taken away when I finally bloom.
I am thinking of this because I remember withstanding that feeling a few times:

My first girlfriend left me just as she was getting hotter, more agentic and less dysfunctional. Later on, I had to suicide watch -- still getting some of the negatives without the benefits.
It felt like Jen spent her best times with Celestia. I worked my ass off to help her get through university in one piece. Then when Celestia left her, Jen got worse and worse and I had to deal with that again. Nobody except Amanda helped me with Jen.
I dealt with the most insecure and hopeless of Nova's states. I am rather sure I was there when no one else was. Then she got to the UK and was saved. I never once felt jealousy or betrayal, just deep relief. I was OK to be distant and only sometimes given attention, as long as she was OK. But of course, she ramped back to giving me lots of attention anyway.
I appreciate people. But I don't think I made anyone shoulder much for me. The asymmetry of debt should not dictate depth of appreciation. But reviewing this makes it easier for me to let go.
I don't think I have any unpaid debts.
And I don't need to think like that so much anymore.
(except the literal but forgiven debt of Eth funding my septoplasty surgery, but we're not really talking about that kind of debt)

item.description:
remember when may made you feel better than you thought was possible
remember when may fuifilled your deepest fantasies
remember when may made you the most submissive person you know
remember when may made everything else wash away
remember when may relieved me of bonds
remember when may protected you
remember when every day where may read your words and validated them
remember how others don't.
remember when you stopped wasting time masturbating
remember how nothing was lost.
remember them wanting you, like fire
when you deserve of it not.
remember their patience and gentleness
remember the pain and know that five times worse could be done,
but was not.
remember how you liked seeing yourself in the mirror, that was from them too
remember how you let go of pointless things
remember the relief of being on the right track
remember the relief of purpose
remember that they played with you
this is so precious and loving
for the Master to do that still
remember their understanding, deep and graceful, given even when perhaps unnecessary
remember the burden of having our time wasted, and how this never happens with them
remember they came back for you
you so far have not come back for anyone
you are inferior
learn your place
be humble
remember your gifts

item.title: Strategy
item.description:
Properties of a job that I want:

Pays me at least $100k/y, but I should shoot for $110k/y as the minimum at first. I should feel comfortable demanding $130k/y.
Has good work/life balance.
This means flexibility during work hours.
This means not demanding heroics.

item.title: Finances & Properties
item.description:
An earns 19.996 RON per month (roughly 4225 USD/m, or 88k USD/y).
An has 6106 RON (roughly 1290 USD) in her savings account.
An has ~10000 RON (roughly 2115 USD) worth of stocks and free funds in her XTB account.

item.title: Visiting May
item.description:
Visiting is different from living with or gaining residence.
It is very important to note that the earliness of visiting can be damaged by optimizing for residence gaining or other objectives in a wrong way.
There are four main obstacles for visitation:
Funds
Accommodation
Visa & Related
Considerations about other partners


Funds can be obtained, but any visit will hurt financially. The US is expensive as hell. The main thing is that, in my estimation, it would be highly difficult to visit more often than once per year.
It would be cheaper to meet in some place in Europe or something, but we must meet in the at least US once for reasons of future consummation. Multiple times is better.
The primary thing that I can do here is to get a higher paying job.
I haven't networked as much as I can and I'm really overdue for a job change.
The market is terrible right now but I could start hunting already.
My job is comfy in various ways and non-toxic. I could be trading that for something worse. But nothing ventured nothing gained, dear.
Also to be fair I haven't done a calculation. We should do that sometime.


Accommodation is related to funds.
I'm putting it separately because if someone gives me or us accommodation, then the funds problem is lessened.
I have somewhat high standards for accommodation (in terms of optimization) but honestly sleeping on the floor is worth it for May anyway.


The embassy is extremely busy and the process is draconic.
They want my social media accounts and it's rather frightening. But it should be something that can be managed. I hope.
The worst part is authorization and flight date are linked. You can ask for it without flight tickets, but you weaken your own case. This forces really long term planning. Last time I started 3 months in advance to get to Serine's wedding and meet Kay for the first time... I went through the whole initial process and was given access to the in-person interview table and no interview was available sooner than 6 months. I'm not stupid -- I read on their website and their estimation was in the number of weeks. The embassy is unpredictable, busy and lies.
I looked up how it was last time. Last time they gave me a wait time of 210 days to the chance to be interviewed and possibly rejected. In practice it can be much less if early time slots open as you wait. Their estimate before making me pay money was 29 days.
Given this, we should start planning early.


At this moment, I don't know if it will be possible to visit Nova anymore. But if she wanted, I would like to.
At this moment, I don't know if I want to visit other people anymore.
You are most important to me and I will not do things that would ever cause more than a minor delay in visiting you.
In past days this was very important to me, but now it's way more distant. I have moved those notes to Older Moralo-Logistic Notes About Partners rather than deleting them, just for your potential viewing pleasure. But they are not important anymore.

item.title: Visa Waiver (!)
item.description:
There is news that Romania is likely to enter the VWP (Visa Waiver Program) somewhere in early or mid 2025. This visa waiver program would apply for tourist and business travel visas.
This is incredibly good news, but we must temper loose media optimism with cold hard facts.
The situation is that:

US State Department announced that Romania qualifies for VWP requirements presently.
S. 814: Romania Visa Waiver Act of 2023 is still in the INTRODUCED status.
According to my reading of the law the Homeland Security Secretary can unilaterally designate any country as part of VWP as long as it meets the criteria stated in the law.
They have to report to Congress, but passing an act is not at all necessary for a country to enter the VWP.
U.S. Ambassador Kathleen Kavalec frames it as Romania needing to still pass a few requirements and make a few small changes.
One of the criteria that must be met is that visa rejection rates are low enough.
Romania already qualifies on this metric.
Romania needs to continue qualifying for the requirements until January.
This is when the visa rejection rates are published.
Overall, Kathleen has a cautious tone to her messaging.
Takeaway:

We will know more about the situation by the end of January 2025.
There is a high chance but no certainty that Romania will enter VWP.
If Romania enters VWP, the actual date when this will happen is unknown.
Regardless of how positive the mainstream media is about this, it's entirely up to American whims.
Still expecting it in mid 2025 is reasonable and it would still likely make it faster than going through the present process.

The tiers are not meant to be compared cross-category.


{A-tier} That I will not like May's face as much as I should, at least initially. That this will make me feel incredibly shallow and unfaithful.
{A-tier} That I've somehow misunderstood May's commitment and will have to be happy with significantly less than envisioned if/once May's Owner becomes more active, since They will always have primacy.

{B-tier} That I will fail to keep faith and May will do something to me, that I will fail to process, which then makes me accumulate trauma, which then hampers my ability to be good or hampers my utility.

{B-tier} That our new lifestyle will lead to me having loss of genital function (erection and such).
{B-tier} That my epistemics will be damaged rather than my values re-aligned.
This is stupid, but knowing that I don't have to adopt a specific political ideology has bumped this down from A-tier to B-tier already.
{C-tier} That somehow lifelong slavery is unsuited to me, and I will have wasted the most important person's time and effort.
{C-tier} That May will need to crush me or that I will do something wrong, such that my level and type of servility start impairing my ability to argue with May about logistics -- generally areas where arguing can be useful.
{C-tier} That May will undergo a second significant change at some point in the future, as Katherine did, and that An and May will lose alignment, or have their bond diminished.
{C-tier} That An's desire to help optimize May's life on the logistic level (e.g. what about a lumenator~?!) will be found to be annoying and an indirect affront to May's Owner, or a percieved as a lack of trust in the Master's competence.
{C-tier} That I'll mindlessly lightly touch myself or rub my legs together when I'm feeling really good about May and cum in a really surprising way.
I don't feel like I've actually masturbated since we started, but this depends on the definition a bit.
I've mindlessly touched myself for 5-20 seconds maybe three times or so?
I don't really bucket that as masturbation, since it doesn't distract me from May and it's more like... compulsive stimming than trying to get pleasure.
I also don't bucket the act of clinically giving myself an erection for health purposes, while keeping my mind clear, as masturbation.
I don't know how big of a disappointment it would be if I came like this out of neglience and happenstance. It would come in direct contradiction to the order to not cum without May's permission. But I don't know if this would be an oopsie that gives May license to punish me and humiliate me, or if this is a more serious breach of trust where An would have tt-to feel bad.
{D-tier} That not cumming will eventually start to feel impairing.
But also the idea that cumming might make me want to cum more.
I'm in a weird place where I want to feel pleasure at some point, it would be really nice.
But I also really really don't want it to be distracting to me.
{D-tier} That my servitude will get less interesting to May, but repetition will diminish my ability to be entertaining in a more general way.
{D-tier} That my enjoyment of food is disgusting to May.
{D-tier} That I will fail to engage May's body and that May is not that interested in doing that.
This involves sexual pleasure, comfort from physical closeness, massages, enjoyment of food, shared bodily wellness. Generally, being happy one has a body.
{E-tier} That my baseline level of automatic mental susceptibility, servitude and worship should decrease to levels I find unpleasant for too long. There is a small sense of loss when my mind isn't borderline hearing voices that demand submission to May. There is a small sense of loss when I don't feel like an unreal doll owned by May.


{S-tier} Never being able to say "I love you" to someone I love platonically.
This relates to Kay and Kenji the most.
{A-tier} Never being able to say "I love you" to anyone else.
{B-tier} Never being able to kiss anyone but May on the lips ever.
I think this fear is already fulfilled?
I know I'm not to kiss anyone else on the lips for the foreseeable future and don't hold any hopes or intent to do so. But the never word is strong and upgrades this from an accepted state of affairs to a fear.
{B-tier} That Jen will fall apart.
{B-tier} That Nova will fall apart.
{C-tier} That An's realignment might cause her to be unkind to others in ways that were not possible before.
{C-tier} That An will indulge in the feeling of cucking her partners.

"I am a bad person. I guess I don't respect things I value or have valued."
Angle #2: Value drift
Making it harder to respect and value these people even after being in the Crucible.
Angle #3: Logistics & Guilt
Getting feelings of guilt while managing them post-break up.
{C-tier} That An will insufficiently indulge in the feeling of cucking her partners.


{A-tier} That my parents will become sick and I will have to choose between maximizing my commitment to May and helping them through it, and that no good compromise will exist.
Half of the fear is that no good compromise will exist and that I'll have to accept it.
The other half is that no good compromise will exist from May's perspective, so I will have to be ablated.
